line: california  us   a team of researchers has found that an enriched diet and companionship can reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease by increasing serotonin
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: they also discovered that duloxetine  an antidepressant that boosts serotonin levels  could be an alternative to opioids in treating chronic pain
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: the results of the study led by researchers from the university of california  irvine  and the university of minnesota  have been published in the journal  scientific reports
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: finding safe and effective alternatives to opioids is a research priority  especially for patients with sickle cell disease   said dr keith hoots  director of the division of blood diseases and resources at the national heart  lung  and blood institute
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: it s encouraging to see a dose response relationship to nutrients and companions in mice  which guides future research about the role foods and friends may have in helping humans manage chronic pain   added dr hoots
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: scientists have long suspected that feeling pain is connected to a person s mood or state of mind  but the link has never been proven beyond doubt
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: this study supports that connection
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: part of the pain is perception   said kalpna gupta  a visiting professor of medicine at uci and the study s lead author
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: for instance  if i start watching a comedy  suddenly i might forget that i was hurting  mood and a feeling of well being block pain from being perceived
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: sickle cell disease is a painful  lifelong condition that affects about 100 000 americans  according to the centers for disease control and prevention  the majority of whom are african american
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: opioids are the most common method of treating their pain
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: but because they re addictive  and overdoses are a leading cause of death in the united states  gupta s team has been investigating alternatives
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: by suggesting a safe alternative to opioids for pain control  the findings of this study have the potential to change the practice of pain management and save lives   said study co author dr rajendra badgaiyan  a professor of psychiatry at the university of minnesota at the time who s now at the university of texas health science center in san antonio
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: the researchers found that mouse models of sickle cell disease in a  happy environment  experienced less pain from the disorder
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: over a four week period  the pain was reduced for male mice that were placed with female companions and received a diet rich in protein  fatty acids  and amino acids
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: their pain decreased as the diet and companionship caused their brains to secrete serotonin
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: researchers quantified the mice s pain according to the frequency with which they lifted their paws in response to stimuli and by their ability to exert force
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: to confirm that serotonin caused the reduction in pain  the mice were given duloxetine  an antidepressant that works by raising the amount of serotonin in the brain
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: the drug decreased pain levels for both male and female mice
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: the researchers believe that adapting these conditions for humans would produce the same results
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: gupta is recommending that duloxetine be used in clinical trials for sickle cell patients as an alternative to opioids for pain relief
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: in the united states  the stigma associated with opioids can make it difficult for sickle cell patients to lessen their pain
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: patients with sickle cell disease often have to navigate the complex social prejudices of the healthcare system in addition to dealing with severe pain   said varun sagi  a medical student at the university of minnesota and a contributing author on the study
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: finding alternatives to opioids could help alleviate this burden
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: duloxetine could provide an easier to obtain alternative
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: likewise  as in the mice  building strong relationships and improving nutrition might also stimulate serotonin production in humans and thus reduce their pain
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: as the covid 19 pandemic persists  social isolation can make relationship building a challenge  and as unemployment continues to hover around 7 per cent  many americans lack food security
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: as the study suggests  this can impact pain for sickle cell patients and others  so gupta stressed the importance of developing strategies to enhance social interaction and nutrition for those affected
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: —ani
headline: study reveals nutrition  companionship reduce pain in mice with sickle cell disease

line: budget 2021 will go down in history for a number of firsts including the finance minister presenting the first digital budget and announcing that the eighth census of independent india will be the first digital census in the history of the country
headline: fm goes hi tech  reads out budget speech from a tablet

line: the finance minister allocated ₹3 768 crore for carrying out the census in budget 2021 22
headline: fm goes hi tech  reads out budget speech from a tablet

line: in many ways this announcement takes forward the push that the narendra modi government has been giving to digitalisation
headline: fm goes hi tech  reads out budget speech from a tablet

line: in september last year  home minister amit shah had announced that the 2021 census will be conducted through a mobile phone application  moving away from the traditional pen and paper to give digital india a boost
headline: fm goes hi tech  reads out budget speech from a tablet

line: the nationwide exercise will be carried out in 16 languages  the home minister had added
headline: fm goes hi tech  reads out budget speech from a tablet

line: the census will have its reference date as march 1 this year  but for jammu and kashmir  himachal pradesh and uttarakhand it will be october 1  last year  he had said

line: reliance jio भारत में एक बार फ़िर से नया jiophone लेकर आ सकता है

headline: reliance jio can make partnership with vivo for jiophone

headline: reliance jio can make partnership with vivo for jiophone

line: हालाँकि इसके लिए कस्टमर्स को रिलायंस जियो का ही सिम यूज करना होगा
headline: reliance jio can make partnership with vivo for jiophone

headline: reliance jio can make partnership with vivo for jiophone

line: no conversation about good heart health is ever complete without the mention of omega 3 fatty acids
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: these healthy fats are known to reduce inflammation in the body  thus protecting your blood vessels from damage
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: not to mention  they also reduce levels of triglycerides in the body  which are responsible for hardening the arteries
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: there is no denying that omega 3 fatty acids are an essential part of a healthy lifestyle
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: but did you know  they can also come to your rescue in the case of covid 19   get your daily dose of wellness subscribe to our newsletter  according to a study  people who have a higher omega 3 index have a lower probability of dying due to covid 19
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: researchers with the fatty acid research institute  fari  and collaborators at cedars sinai medical center in los angeles and in orange county  ca  published the first direct evidence that higher omega 3 blood levels may reduce the risk for death from covid 19 infection
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: the report was published in the journal ‘prostaglandins  leukotrienes and essential fatty acids’
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: covid 19 and omega 3 fatty acids  what’s the link   there are several papers in medical literature hypothesizing that omega 3 fatty acids should have beneficial effects in patients with covid 19 infection  but up until now there have been no published peer reviewed studies supporting that hypothesis
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: this study included a 100 patients admitted to the hospital with covid 19 for whom admission blood samples had been stored
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: clinical outcomes for these patients were obtained and blood was analyzed for the omega 3 index  o3i  red blood cell membrane epa dha levels
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: while not meeting standard statistical significance thresholds  this pilot study—along with multiple lines of evidence regarding the anti inflammatory effects of epa and dha—strongly suggests that these nutritionally available marine fatty acids may help reduce the risk for adverse outcomes in covid 19 patients
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: larger studies are clearly needed to confirm these preliminary findings   said arash asher  md  the lead author on this study
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: the researchers believe that an excessive inflammatory response  referred to as a ‘cytokine storm ’ is a fundamental mediator of severe covid 19 illness
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: omega 3 fatty acids  dha and epa  have potent anti inflammatory activities  and this pilot study provides suggestive evidence that these fatty acids may dampen covid 19’s cytokine storm
headline: people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19
people with high omega 3 levels in their body are less likely to die from covid 19

line: agri and food companies on monday hailed the decision to hike farm credit target and increase allocation for the agriculture ministry in the budget  saying this will help in boosting farmers  income and overall growth of the sector
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: asserting that the government is committed towards farmers  welfare  finance minister nirmala sitharaman on monday proposed 10 per cent hike in the farm loan disbursal target to rs 16
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: 5 lakh crore  and introduced an agri infra and development cess of up to 100 per cent to create post harvest infrastructure for improving farmers  income
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: advertisement  the minister also proposed higher allocation for rural infrastructure development fund and micro irrigation fund  and extended agriculture infrastructure fund to apmcs for augmenting infrastructure facilities
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: 2020 has been a year of exceptional and unprecedented challenges and has highlighted the critical importance of two core sectors  agriculture and healthcare
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: the union budget 2021 has correctly called out the role of these two sectors in leading the nation s recovery and being catalysts to sustainable growth    said d narain  senior bayer representative  south asia and ceo   md  bayer cropscience
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: higher allocations for both healthcare and agriculture with specific focus on building public health infrastructure  expansion of credit to farmers  additional allocation for rural infrastructure and micro irrigation are welcome moves  he said
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: these initiatives complement actions already initiated to double farmers  incomes and enabling wider healthcare access for the nation    narain added
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: ram kaundinya  director general  federation of seed industry of india  fsii   said it is a status quo budget for agriculture in general and for seed industry in particular
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: agriculture contributed significantly to our successful fight against covid
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: but the sector did not get the needed attention in the budget
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: no transformative measures have been proposed    he said
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: on the positives  kaundinya said an increase in agricultural credit to rs 16
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: 5 lakh crore will help farmers in accessing more credit and rs 10 000 crore for micro irrigation is also a good measure
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: increasing import duty on cotton is a good measure that should help in improving domestic prices although we are no longer a major cotton importer
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: we are actually the largest exporter in the world  courtesy bt cotton driven increase in cotton production    he said
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: output marketing related measures like extending enam  national agriculture market  to 1 000 more mandis and making agri infrastructure fund available for upgrading infrastructure in apmcs are welcome  fsii said
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: on disappointments  kaundinya said investments in research in agriculture are not addressed  especially since research and innovation is one of the six pillars of aatmanirbhar bharat and there is a need to scale up private sector investments in agricultural research
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: seed industry was expecting restoration of 200 per cent tax deduction of research expenses but it has not been met  he added
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: the industry expected a major project to invest in scaling up domestic oilseeds production through incentives for farmers  use of modern technologies in crops like mustard  soybean and groundnut would be announced with an eye on reducing huge imports of edible oils  he said
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: maithili appalwar  ceo  avana  said    the proposed outlay of rs 2
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: 87 lakh crore under the jal jeevan mission supports our vision of water conservation and sanitation
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: with agriculture taking a centre stage in this year s budget  we appreciate the government s pragmatic measures of an influx of rs 10 000 crore as part of the micro irrigation corpus fund  a double since last fiscal
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: announcement of the agriculture credit target of rs 16
headline: budget  agri cos cheer higher allocation to farm sector

line: addressing a press conference here  he said   this budget is a different budget altogether
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: it is a transformational budget  it is a future ready budget for railway  it is a path breaking budget
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: new delhi  feb 1  ians  with railways getting the highest ever total plan capex at rs 2
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: 15 lakh crore  railway board chairman and ceo suneet sharma on monday described the union budget 2021 22 as a  transformational  budget for the national transporter and one which has focus on deliverance
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma said the focus of this budget is on deliverance  commitment to delivery  time schedule  focus on customers  focus on technology  induction to provide better services to customers  better passenger and freight services
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: highlighting the works of the railways during the covid pandemic  he said   during the year  we have been able to make significant change in our working
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: during this difficult time of covid pandemic  we could transport essential commodities from one part of the country to other
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: we also took initiative in moving our migrants
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he stressed that the covid was a difficult time  but railways used it as an opportunity
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: there was a large number of works which we did during covid pandemic  by removing bottlenecks  repairs and rehabilitation of assets   he said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma also said that the works resulted in the average speed of the trains showing a dramatic growth in doubling the speed of the freight trains from 23 kmph to 46 kmph
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: on the details of the budget announced by union finance minister nirmala sitharaman in lok sabha  he said   indian railways has now highest ever total plan capex of rs 2 15 058 crore this year with rs 7 500 crore from internal resources  rs 1 00 258 crore from extra budgetary resources and rs 1 07 100 crore for capital expenditure allocation given in the general budget
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that the railways received a record outlay of rs 1 10 055 crore  of which rs 1 07 100 crore is for capital expenditure
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: the gross budgetary allocation is rs 37 050 crore higher than be 2020 21  which is 53 per cent
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: inspite of the covid  this is remarkable vindication of the progress being made being undertaken in infrastructure projects in railways   sharma said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: with this increase in capex  indian railways will be the driver of indian economy
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: the thrust of annual plan 2021 22 is on infrastructure development  throughput enhancement  development of terminal facilities  augmentation of speed of trains  signaling systems  improvement of passengers or users  amenities  safety works of road over or under bridges etc   he said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: discussing the national rail plan  he said the nrp envisages the plan for railways for 2050 for which the infrastructure needs to be prepared by 2030
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma also said that national projects of jammu and kashmir  himachal pradesh  uttarakhand and north eastern region have been allocated highest ever outlay of rs 12 985 crore
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that in budget estimate of 2021 22 against the revised estimate of 2020 21 of rs 7 535 crore  there is an increase of 72 per cent
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that rs 37 270 crore of gross budgetary support has been allocated for investment in psu/jv/spvs  with allocation for dfccil at rs 16 086 crore  for national high speed rail corporation ltd  nhsrcl  at rs 14 000 crore and kolkata metro rail corporation ltd  kmrcl  at rs 900 crore
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: highlighting the projects which the railways completed last year  he said   during the covid pandemic  we completed some important projects like connecting the railway line to kevadia in gujarat for the statue of unity  inauguration of over 650 km of dedicated freight corridor  dfc
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that railways are hopeful of completing another 500 km of dfc by this financial year and complete the entire project by june 2022
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he also said that wheel production will also be indigenised in rae bareli  as well as vande bharat train sets  track machines  and also the train collision avoidance system  tcas
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: we have started using tcas for 250 km of south central railway and for 1 200 km of sanctioned work is going on
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: and we plan to cover the high density network and high utility network in coming years   sharma said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: discussing the future plan of railways  the ceo said   at least 150 more private trains through ppp mode  more tejas trains  more vista dome coach trains for tourists  3rd ac economy class coaches  smart coaches which are providing more features like announcements  temperature control system and to check water levels  head on generation cars to make space for more coaches
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that satellite based tracking of trains with isro already operational on 6 500 trains
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: ians  aks/vd
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: the budget held some cheers for real estate developers  particularly those with affordable housing projects
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: in a bid to increase the supply of affordable housing units  the finance minister announced extension of tax holiday up to march 2022
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: this will encourage developers to launch new projects under this category
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: according to real estate consultant anarock  affordable housing accounts for more than 35 per cent of the supply across the top seven cities in the country
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: since the re opening of economy  this segment has seen higher demand from home buyers
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: however  some of the other expectations of developers  including increasing the cap in the value  currently at ₹45 lakh  of an affordable housing unit  and infrastructure status for real estate industry  have not been met in the budget
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: the realty sector has been witnessing steady recovery in its residential demand across categories — affordable housing  mid income and premium housing — since june last year
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: the various measures announced by the centre since may last year have worked in favour of the developers
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: the realty index  which includes companies with presence in affordable housing such as brigade enterprises and sunteck realty  has rallied 78 per cent since june last year to now
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: according to a knight frank india real estate report  housing sales in the second half of last year  july to december  have declined 19 per cent compared to the same period in the previous year
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: while housing sales are yet to recover to pre covid levels  between h1 2020 and h2 2020  sales have increased 60 per cent  particularly from affordable and mid income housing projects
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: to maintain this momentum  the budget has given a boost to developers under section 80 iba
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: currently  developers claim 100 per cent deduction of profits from affordable housing projects under this section
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: the deduction is applicable only if these projects are approved during the period from june 1  2016  to march 31  2021
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: now  this benefit has been extended up to march 31  2022
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: this will benefit developers with focus on affordable housing projects  including brigade enterprises  sobha  sunteck realty and mahindra lifespaces
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: given the off take in residential demand  these companies have fared better between april and december last year
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: for instance  sobha  a bengaluru based realty player in mid income  affordable and luxury housing  reported increase in new sales  value  by 22 per cent y o y to ₹887
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: 6 crore during december quarter 2020
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: a comfortable debt position too has helped these companies withstand challenging times
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: further  under section 80 iba  the centre has also given 100 per cent deductions of profits and gains derived from the business of developing and building housing projects for rent
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing

line: on the other hand  if the centre had announced extension of credit linked subsidy scheme  clss  where centre provides subsidy for home loans taken by first time home buyers  for middle income group  it would have helped developers off load their unsold units faster
headline: budget homes in on affordable housing
budget homes in on affordable housing

line: new delhi the proposal to increase customs duty on certain imported automotive parts in the union budget 2020 21 will lead to increase in car prices  according to merecedes benz india and skoda auto volkswagen  even as component makers said the step will encourage local manufacturing of such items
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: the government on monday proposed an increase in customs duty on certain imported components used in automobiles
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: in the budget 2021 22  finance minister nirmala sitharaman proposed increase in customs duty of various parts  including ignition wiring sets  safety glass and parts of signalling equipment to 15 per cent with effect from february 2
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: the parts would also attract agriculture infrastructure and development cess at the rate of 5 per cent
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: currently  the parts attract customs duty in the range of 7
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: 5 10 per cent
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: the increase in the rise in auto component duties is unexpected in such a revival period  and it will increase the production cost  leading to higher cost for consumers   mercedes benz india managing director and ceo martin schwenk said in a statement
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: besides  there could have been further push towards e mobility by lowering import duties on electric vehicles  he added
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: similarly  skoda auto volkswagen india managing director gurpratap boparai said the increase in customs duty on certain auto parts to 15 per cent will further increase input costs and prices for cars which depend on specialised components which cannot be manufactured locally due to unviable volumes
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: it is important to keep in mind that even in the coming financial year  the passenger vehicle market is unlikely to reach the level of 2018 and the much required rationalisation of gst and cess to aid the auto industry was missing  he added
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: both schwenk and boparai however welcomed the announcement of scrappage policy
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: the government said the changes in basic customs duty is for creating level playing fields for the benefit of micro  small and medium enterprises  msmes  and other domestic manufacturers
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: we are raising custom duty on certain auto parts to 15 per cent to bring them on par with the general rate of auto parts   sitharaman said in her budget speech
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: automotive component manufacturers association president deepak jain said the increase in basic customs duty on select auto components will encourage local manufacturing of such items
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: hailing the announcement of the scrappage policy  he noted that the announcements with regards increased spend on road infrastructure  voluntary scrappage policy  research and development and pli among others  augur well for the automotive sector
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: similarly  federation of automobile dealers associations  fada  president vinkesh gulati said if 1990 is taken as a base year  there were around 37 lakh commercial vehicles and 52 lakh passenger vehicles eligible for voluntary scrapping
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: we still need to see the fine prints to access the kind of incentives which will be on offer and thus have a positive effect on retail   he added
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: hyundai motor india managing director  md  and chief executive officer  ceo  ss kim said the proposed vehicle scrappage policy will provide thrust towards procurement of new automobiles and have a strong positive effect giving a boost to atmanirbhar bharat
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: tata motors ceo and md guenter butschek said voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to phase out old and unfit vehicles  augmenting public transport system in urban areas  continuing focus on adoption of cleaner fuels  and enhancing outlays for developing road infrastructure are positive steps for the auto industry
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: toyota kirloskar motor  tkm  vice chairman vikram kirloskar said the long awaited scrapping policy could contribute to lower fuel consumption  lessen pollution while also generating additional demand for cleaner new vehicles
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: the auto sector welcomes this announcement and is hopeful that for realising full benefits there will be an early and full implementation of this policy   he added
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: similarly  honda cars india senior vice president   director  marketing and sales  rajesh goel said the scrappage policy was one of the long awaited announcements for the auto sector
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: expressing similar views  renault india operations country ceo and managing director venkatram mamillapalle said the policy will significantly reduce pollution and should help bolster demand for new vehicles in the commercial and passenger vehicle sectors
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: mahindra   mahindra md and ceo pawan goenka said   though details are not yet out  when the policy comes out  it should have full incentive for scrapping and not just disincentive for not scrapping
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: the union budget 2021 has several positive signals for the manufacturing sector and the commercial vehicles  cv  sector  which are core to the economy  ashok leyland md and ceo vipin sondhi said
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: the rs 18 000 crore scheme to augment public transport in urban areas with the addition of 20 000 new buses in a ppp model would ensure cleaner and efficient public transportation and ease congestion  he added
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: apollo tyres chairman onkar s kanwar also said the voluntary vehicle scrappage policy will provide the much needed fillip to the auto and tyre industry
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: sitharaman on monday announced the much awaited voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to phase out old and polluting vehicles
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: presenting the budget for 2021 22 in parliament  sitharaman said that under voluntary vehicle scrapping policy  personal vehicles would undergo fitness tests after 20 years while commercial vehicles would require it after completion of 15 years
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: road transport  highways and msmes minister nitin gadkari said the policy will lead to new investment of around rs 10 000 crore and create as many as 50 000 jobs
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: he further said the policy would cover over 1 crore light  medium and heavy motor vehicles
headline: mercedes  skoda say custom duty hike on certain parts to lead to increase in vehicle prices

line: to help ensure that all systems and components will operate reliably  automotive systems engineers require an advanced  automated tool for generating   verifying software code
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: in today’s fast paced  high stakes design environment  engineering teams can no longer rely on outdated tools   processes for ensuring system integrity
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: instead  they require a comprehensive simulation solution offered by an industry leader focused on helping customers bring better products to market faster
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: this article by ansys – a global leader in engineering simulation – talks about the benefits gained if engineers relied on a customised tool created specifically for automotive systems design  how engineering automotive systems have become more challenging and the need to comply with increasingly complex   stringent standards for automotive electronics
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: today’s automotive systems are more complex  smarter and autonomous than ever before  featuring functionality that no one could have imagined 10 years ago
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: advanced sensors and electronics control everything  from a vehicle’s speed   position to its entertainment   communication technologies
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: radar  cameras and other sophisticated electronics are increasingly being incorporated into consumer vehicles
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: in fact  today  more than 60  of a car’s cost comes from its advanced electronics and software systems
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: since many of the functions guided by electronic systems are mission critical  it’s essential that all automotive systems work together with complete reliability
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: the tens of millions of lines of software code that control these systems must be flawless
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: yet  this presents a challenge for automotive systems engineers  since many of the technology systems and components are sourced from different suppliers
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: engineers are challenged with the critical task of creating a robust  failsafe system architecture  complete with controls that ensure the system’s consistent operation
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: most automotive systems engineering teams rely on manual processes   generic tools  such as excel  to generate   verify this architecture
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: because these tools are not created specifically for the task of automotive systems design  they do not support rapid or consistent engineering results
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: the associated manual processes can be extremely time consuming and are subject to human error
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: manual processes prove insufficient not only for initial systems design but also for ongoing tweaks and updates
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: as changes are made in one component of the overall system  the entire electronics system architecture must be re engineered
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: a single change must be verified against hundreds of other components and associated inputs to ensure that the integrity of the overall automotive system is maintained
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: with incredible pressures in the automotive industry to innovate often and launch those innovations rapidly  engineers need a new solution to manage these complex systems engineering tasks
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: in today’s fast paced  highly competitive industry landscape  they can no longer afford to rely on the tools   processes of the past
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: advanced engineering requires advanced tools  the process of engineering an automotive system may be complex  but it is  in the end  a step by step process that can benefit from automation
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: what’s needed is a new model based  automated solution that walks engineers through the various tasks involved in architecture design and verification
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: in addition  as changes are made in one component  the ideal technology solution would automate the process of making any associated changes across the entire system — ensuring its continued safe  consistent operation
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: by relying on an advanced technology tool to accomplish these tasks  automotive engineers could not only save time   money  they could also increase the accuracy and reliability of the resulting system
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: if engineers relied on a customised tool created specifically for automotive systems design  they could realise these important benefits   an estimated 40  savings in costs associated with software code validation   verification activities  due to significant time savings   lower personnel needs  greater control over complex system architecture tasks  as the new model based tool would follow a proven  step by step approach  a higher level of system reliability  safety and security because the risk of human error would be minimised with the application of an advanced tool  a reduction in physical testing investments  since any flaws in software code would be identified   addressed at an early stage  a holistic approach that not only considers individual components but also how they are integrated with one another to form a complete system  simplifying even the most complex tasks  the ideal model based solution would be built specifically for the way automotive systems are engineered today
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: it would be able to address a range of system designs  incorporating a broad range of components   connectivity
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: via reduced ordered modelling and a step by step process  the new solution would accelerate the system engineering process without sacrificing the accuracy or robustness of verification activities
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: with the emergence of radar   lidar technologies and autonomous driving  engineering automotive systems have become even more challenging
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: any new software engineering solution would have to ensure the safe operation of a given car under a wide range of driving scenarios
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: ideally  the new tool would also accommodate the different ways that engineering teams work together  integrating well with other common design tools and support processes
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: in order to be as user friendly as possible for a variety of teams  the modelling solution should work across multiple platforms and languages  including sysml
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: support for automotive industry standards  in 2003  a network of leaders in the worldwide automotive industry came together to create automotive open system architecture  autosar  — a set of standards that define an open software architecture for automotive electronics
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: other relevant industry standards include iso 26262 and asam mcd2 dc
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: any new software modelling solution must support these accepted industry standards to ensure that the resulting systems can be certified   approved
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: engineering teams would benefit by developing overall software designs  interfaces and exchanges that work across multiple vehicle platforms and are accepted by multiple auto manufacturers
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: the need to comply with increasingly complex and stringent standards for automotive electronics only emphasises the need for an advanced  customised modelling solution
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: generic tools lack the intelligence to recognise and comply with industry standards  which means compliance must be managed manually
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: by incorporating compliance into its underlying capabilities  a dedicated modelling solution would minimise human resource needs   time commitments  while maximising confidence that the final design will easily pass any regulatory approvals
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: backed by a proven leader  to provide the greatest value — and the highest level of confidence — to automotive engineering teams  any new modelling solution should be developed by an industry leader
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: the software developer should not only have a suite of proven products for software code generation and validation but also a long list of satisfied customers who have successfully applied its modelling solutions
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: deep experience in generating   verifying control software code in related industries  including aviation  rail transportation and nuclear power  would instil confidence in automotive engineers
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: the fact that similar software tools have been used successfully in more than 100 certified projects would help establish credibility among automotive engineering teams
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: since system engineering is often closely coupled with other automotive engineering tasks  it would be best if the provider of the modelling solution offered a suite of related projects for automotive engineering applications
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: not only would this ensure easy integration of solutions and seamless collaboration among various functions but it would also ensure that the model based tool is developed to work with the most common systems   technologies used by today’s engineering teams
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: driving toward the future  a model based approach to automotive system designing promises a range of benefits  including a significant increase in the productivity of engineering staff
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

line: as designers rely on an advanced tool to manage their code generation   verification tasks  new systems architectures can be launched much more rapidly
headline: driving speed   reliability in automotive systems engineering

headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: 1  2021  february 8 to 15  dravet syndrome foundation  lennox gastaut syndrome  lgs  foundation  tuberous sclerosis alliance  mary anne meskis  craig chambliss  kari luther rosbeck  mike davis  dravetfoundation
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: org  /prnewswire/    the inaugural seizure action plan  sap  awareness week will be held  organized by the seizure action plan coalition  which is a collaboration of the  theand the
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: the campaign is underwritten by presenting sponsor neurelis  inc
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: with generous supporting funding from ucb  inc
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: sap week will highlight the need for people with epilepsy to have a conversation with their healthcare providers  especially if they are in a key subgroup who would benefit from a seizure action plan like those who have intractable epilepsy syndromes  who are at high risk for seizure clusters  status epilepticus or have frequent nocturnal generalized tonic clonic seizures   said dr
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: tracy dixon salazar  lgs foundation executive director
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: sap awareness week features a social media campaign and new website designed to highlight the need for people with epilepsy  their caregivers and healthcare providers to develop detailed plans  especially should an emergency occur
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: the social media campaign incorporates the hashtag  sapaw2021 and urges people to learn more at seizureactionplans
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: org
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: according to the centers for disease control and prevention  approximately 3
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: 5 million americans have epilepsy  which is roughly 3 million adults and 470 000 children and teens   explained  executive director  dravet syndrome foundation
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: about one third of people with epilepsy will eventually develop refractory epilepsy or drug resistant epilepsy  making a seizure action plan an important management tool  so this new awareness week is critical for educating the epilepsy community about this important issue
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: a seizure rescue plan is a critical component in the overall management of seizure emergencies   said  president and chief executive officer of neurelis  inc
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: we are excited to see the launch of this website as an important new resource that will benefit people living with epilepsy and those who care for them
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: in addition  the launch of seizure action plan awareness week helps spotlight the important need for everyone with epilepsy to have a thoughtful and comprehensive seizure action plan
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: it is our privilege to partner in this effort and many other initiatives in the epilepsy community
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: in a recent study  only 30  of adult patients responded that they have a seizure action plan  and only 45  of pediatric patients had a seizure action plan
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: a seizure action plan can offer more control to patients and caregivers by providing consistent  patient specific guidance regarding seizure management
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: a seizure action plan can also provide clarification on patient and caregiver concerns  such as understanding what to do during a seizure  when watchful waiting is appropriate  when to call 911 or go to the hospital  and much more   shared  president and ceo  tuberous sclerosis alliance
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: we ve heard from people living with epilepsy  their caregivers  and physicians that a seizure action plan can make the difference in the day to day  lived experience of a person living with a seizure disorder   said  head of u
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: s
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: neurology  ucb
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: we are proud to support this important education to ensure that people living with epilepsy have the tools and medications they need  and we are committed to developing rescue treatments to stop seizure clusters when and where they occur as well as to rapidly terminate active epileptic seizures
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: all adults and children with epilepsy need a seizure action plan  especially those with new onset epilepsy and those with ongoing frequent convulsive seizures who had more than one seizure in the previous year
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: seizure free patients who have risk factors for breakthrough seizures may also benefit from a seizure action plan
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: in addition  those who need help to identify their individual seizure pattern  do not have a plan  or live far from medical facilities are key subgroups who would benefit from a seizure action plan
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

line: for more information on seizure action plan awareness week  visit seizureactionplans
headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

headline: seizure action plan awareness week scheduled for february 8 14

ट्रांसफर की जाती है। एप के माध्यम से जितना ही ये लोन लेने में आसान है उससे कहीं ज्यादा लोग इसमें ठगी का शिकार हो रहे हैं।  नई दिल्ली   जागरण स्पेशल । पिछले कुछ दिनों से एक नई तरह की ठगी का मामला सामने आया है। देश के कई बड़े शहरों में लोन एप  loan app  के जरिए ठगी की जा रही है। आज के इस दौर में हर किसी को लोन की जरूरत पड़ती ही है। इसी का फायदा उठाते हुए कई कंपनियां लोगों को घर बैठे एप के माध्यम से लोन दे रही हैं। इन लोन एप के माध्यम से छोटी से छोटी और बड़ी से बड़ी रकम आपके बैंक खाते में आसानी से ट्रांसफर की जाती है। एप के माध्यम से जितना ही ये लोन लेने में आसान है उससे कहीं ज्यादा लोग इसमें ठगी का शिकार हो रहे हैं।  आइये विस्तार से जानते हैं क्या है ठगी का मामला  कोरोना संकट के मौजूदा दौर में जल्द से जल्द लोन पाने की चाहत रखने वाले लोग ऐसे झांसे में आकर आवेदन करते हैं। इस तरह के एप के जरिए कई कंपनियां लुभावनी ब्याज दर पर बहुत ही कम समय में लोन देने का वादा करती हैं। बाद में बकाया रकम की वसूली के लिए जोर जबरदस्ती करती हैं और फिर मनचाहा ब्याज जोड़ती हैं। इसके बाद लोन कंपनियां ग्राहकों को परेशान करके जल्द से जल्द अधिक ब्याज में पैसा वसूलने की डिमांड करती हैं।  एप के माध्यम से लोन लेने के लिए इन बात का रखें विशेष ध्यान  कोरोना संकट के दौर में ज्यादातर लोगों की अपनी जमापूंजी खत्म हो रही है। इसी का फायदा उठाकर लोन कंपनियां एप के माध्यम से कर्ज दे रही है। ये कर्ज बेहद आसान तरीकों यानी  कम डॉक्यूमेंट  में दिया जाता है। इससे ग्राहकों को लोन लेने में कोई शुरुआती दिक्कत नहीं होती है। यहां हम आपको बताने वाले हैं कि कैसे इन लोन कंपनियों के झांसे से बचने के लिए खुद को सतर्क रखें।  जल्दी लोन पाने के चक्कर में लोग डिजिटल फर्जीवाड़े का शिकार हो रहे हैं। इसलिए मोबाइल एप के जरिए लोन लेने से बचें  क्योंकि आपके डॉक्यूमेंट्स के साथ फर्जीवाड़ा किया जा सकता है।  लोन लेने से पहले कंपनियों का अगला पिछला रिकार्ड जरूर चेक कर लें। ऐसी कंपनियां ग्राहकों से ज्यादा ब्याज वसूलती हैं  साथ ही इनमें कई तरह के छिपे हुए चार्ज होते हैं  जो ग्राहकों को शुरू में पता नहीं होते।  ग्राहकों को कभी भी अपने kyc दस्तावेज की कॉपी बगैर पहचान वाले व्यक्ति  या किसी लोन एप में नहीं अपलोड करना चाहिए।  लोन लेने वाली कंपनी से प्रोसेसिंग फीस और अन्य खर्च के बारे में भी पता करें।  लोन कंपनियों से जो ऑफर दिए जा रहे हैं उनके बारे में पूरी जानकारी जुटाएं।  इसके साथ ही लोन कंपनी के बार में आरबीआई के वेबसाइट में जाकर अच्छी तरह से जानकारी इकठ्ठा करें।  शॉर्ट मे जानें सभी बड़ी खबरें और पायें ई पेपर ऑडियो न्यूज़ और अन्य सर्विस  डाउनलोड जागरण ऐप

line: 60 लाख करोड़ रुपए का आर्थिक नुकसान हुआ है। फिलहाल देश में करीब 14 करोड़ लोग खराब हवा में सांस लेने को मजबूर हैं। दुनिया के 20 सबसे प्रदूषित शहरों में 13 भारत में ही हैं। ऐसे में खराब हवा स्वस्थ लोगों को भी बीमार बना रही है और पहले से बीमार लोगों के लिए जानलेवा बन रही है।  वायु प्रदूषण से होने वाली बीमारियां कौन सी हैं   एम्स  aiims  दिल्ली में रुमेटोलॉजी डिपार्टमेंट की हेड डॉक्टर उमा कुमार कहती हैं। वायु प्रदूषण से सभी तरह की नॉन कम्युनिकेबल डिजीज का खतरा होता है। हार्ट  कार्डियो वैस्कुलर  ऑटो इम्युन डिजीज का भी सबसे ज्यादा खतरा होता है।  हाल ही में ब्रिटेन में हुई एक स्टडी के मुताबिक एयर पॉल्यूशन ज्यादा होने से कोरोना होने की आशंका बढ़ जाती है। एयर पॉल्यूशन की वजह से ओजोन की लेअर डैमेज हो रही है। इसका सीधा संबंध अल्ट्रा वॉयलट किरणों से है। वहीं  इससे शरीर में विटामिन d की कमी भी हो सकती है।  प्रदूषण से हुई मौतों के मायने क्या हैं   icmr की रिपोर्ट के मुताबिक  इंडोर वायु प्रदूषण से होने वाली मौतों में 1990 से 2019 तक 64  की कमी आई है। लेकिन  आउटडोर हवा में मौजूद प्रदूषण से होने वाली मौतों में 115  का इजाफा हुआ है।  वायु प्रदूषण किस बीमारी के लिए कितना जिम्मेदार   icmr के महानिदेशक बलराम भार्गव ने बताया कि अध्ययन के नतीजे बताते हैं कि वायु प्रदूषण फेंफड़ों से जुड़ी बीमारियों के 40  मामलों के लिए जिम्मेदार है।  हार्ट डिजीज  स्ट्रोक  डायबिटीज और समय से पहले पैदा होने वाले नवजात बच्चों की मौत के लिए वायु प्रदूषण 60  तक जिम्मेदार है।  रिपोर्ट में कहा गया है कि यदि वायु प्रदूषण रोकने के लिए सही उपाय नहीं किए  तो भारत को बड़ा खामियाजा उठाना पड़ेगा।  वायु प्रदूषण से होने वाली मौतें  बीमारियां और आर्थिक नुकसान की वजह से भारत का 2024 तक 5 ट्रिलियन डॉलर की अर्थव्यवस्था बनने का सपना भी टूट सकता है।  इस रिपोर्ट से सीखने वाली 3 अहम बातें क्या हैं   वायु प्रदूषण के खतरों के प्रति जागरुकता की जरूरत है। सरकार को वायु प्रदूषण रोकने के लिए बड़े और कड़े कदम उठाने होंगे। आम लोगों से भी प्रदूषण रोकने में सहयोग की दरकार होगी।  वायु प्रदूषण में सबसे अहम रोल किन चीजों का है   डॉक्टर उमा कहती है कि वायु प्रदूषण में सबसे बड़ा रोल गाड़ियों से होने वाले पॉल्यूशन का होता है। गाड़ियों से निकलने वाला धुंआ और उड़ने वाली धूल दोनों सेहत के नुकसानदायक हैं। हमने कुछ समय पहले एक स्टडी की थी। उसमें पाया था कि जिनका घर सड़क से जितना ज्यादा करीब होता है  उन लोगों में ऑटो इम्युन डिजीज का खतरा उतना ज्यादा होता है। इसे हमने सरोगेट पॉल्यूशन नाम दिया। इसलिए हमारी कोशिश होनी चाहिए कि घर मुख्य सड़क से दूर खरीदें।  इसके अलावा एयर पॉल्यूशन सिर्फ आउटडोर ही नहीं  इनडोर होता है। दोनों पॉल्यूशन बराबर तौर पर सेहत के लिए खतरनाक हैं। इंडोर पॉल्यूशन से बचने के लिए आप एयर प्यूरीफायर भी लगवा सकते हैं  यह प्रदूषण को कम करने में थोड़ा बहुत मददगार है।  टोबेको पॉल्यूशन एयर पॉल्यूशन से भी ज्यादा खतरनाक  एम्स दिल्ली में डीएम कार्डियोलॉजिस्ट डॉक्टर संजय कुमार चुघ कहते हैं टोबेको पॉल्यूशन  एयर पॉल्यूशन से भी ज्यादा खतरनाक हैं। इसके अलावा वॉटर  फूड  नॉइज पॉल्यूशन भी बहुत खतरनाक हैं। इसलिए हमें एयर के साथ बाकी पॉल्यूशन से भी दूर रहना चाहिए।  एयर पॉल्यूशन सांस के मरीजों के बहुत ज्यादा खतरनाक है। हवा में प्रदूषण होने से ऑक्सीजन का लेवल कम हो जाता है। इसके चलते थकान लगती है और काम करने की क्षमता में भी कमी आती है।  क्या भारतीय कानून हमें प्रदूषण से बचा सकते हैं   भारत में वायु प्रदूषण की रोकथाम के लिए साल 1981 में एक एयर एक्ट लागू किया गया था  लेकिन पिछले 40 साल में इस कानून के तहत दर्ज किए गए मुकदमों की संख्या न के बराबर है। वहीं इन 40 सालों में भारतीय शहरों में वायु प्रदूषण गंभीर स्तर पर पहुंच चुका है।

line: finance minister nirmala sitharaman seems to have presented the union budget 2021 22 with an aim to give fillip to the indian government s disinvestment agenda
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: she announced several policy measures  including privatisation of two banks and one general insurance company along with asset monetisation to ensure government has enough money to push for economic growth
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: union budget 2021 22 reaffirms that the narendra modi government s philosophy that  it is not the government s business to be in business
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: presenting her third budget today  sitharaman estimated rs 1 75 000 crore as disinvestment receipts for 2021 22  which is much lower than last year s disinvestment budget target of rs 2
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: 1 lakh crore
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: notably  last year s disinvestment receipts dropped down severely to less than 6
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: 5 times  rs 32 000 crore
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: she added that government plans to complete sale of bpcl  air india  shipping corporation of india  container corporation of india  idbi bank  beml  pawan hans  neelachal ispat nigam limited among others in next fiscal
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: outlining the modi government s privatisation policy  sitharaman said   four areas that are strategic where bare minimum cpses will be maintained and rest privatized
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: in the remaining sectors all cpses will be privatized
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: the government will keep presence through public sector companies only in atomic energy  space and defence  transport and telecommunications  power  petroleum  coal and other minerals and banking  insurance and financial services
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: rest all psus will be privatised or sold
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: the modi government s roadmap is now clear
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: former finance secretary and economic affairs secretary subhash chandra garg says  privatisation is a kind of disinvestment
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: disinvestment can be strategic where you can sale and pass on the management control or disinvestment can be small bit of shares where you retain the management control and ownership with you
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: he explained that it is possible to sell bank on strategic basis
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: you may decide to sell your entire share holding or you may decide to sell a little less than but pass on the strategic control to the buyer
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: there is complete possibility of privatisation of public sector bank but it would require some changes in law as currently the banking regulation acts and nationalisation banking acts don t permit it
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: that would require amendment in law
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: garg said which banks are on government s radar  would reveal the government s stand
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: if you privatise smaller unhealthy banks like indian overseas bank or some other bank  it may not be such a big deal
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: if you do a better bank like canara bank  bank of baroda kind of banks then it will be real good privatisation   he added
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: earlier in 2003 04  the government had disinvested strategically balco  hindustan zinc  and a couple of itdc hotels
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: sitharaman said   idle assets will not contribute to atmanirbhar bharat
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: the non core assets largely consist of surplus land with government ministries/departments and public sector enterprises
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: monetising of land can either be by way of direct sale or concession or by similar means
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: this requires special abilities and for this purpose  i propose to use a special purpose vehicle in the form of a company that would carry out this activity
headline: home n            union budget 2021  can privatisation fuel government s disinvestment agenda

line: the national highways authority of india  nhai  undertook the indian government s first attempt for asset monetisation

line: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal   photo credit  ians  new delhi  the delhi high court monday sought to know whether us based e commerce giant amazon and kishore biyani led future retail ltd  frl  were open to resolving the issue arising out of rs 24 713 crore deal between frl and reliance retail
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the counsel for both  amazon and future group  submitted that they would seek instructions and inform the court on tuesday
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the court was hearing a plea by amazon seeking direction to order enforcement of the award by singapore s emergency arbitrator  ea  restraining frl from going ahead with its rs 24 713 crore deal with reliance retail
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: amazon
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: com nv investment holdings llc  in its plea  also sought detention of the biyanis  directors of future coupons pvt ltd  fcpl  and frl and other related parties in civil prison and attaching of their properties for alleged  wilful disobedience  of the emergency arbitrator s order
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: justice j r midha asked the parties to inform it on tuesday if any such endeavour could be made and clarified that this should not be taken as deferring the proceedings and it would continue as scheduled
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the court  which asked if any attempt has been made to resolve the issue  suggested that if parties would be willing  it can refer the matter to two retired judges of the supreme court
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the court also said it will consider whatever protective order can be passed
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in commercial matters  it is always helpful to find a solution  it said
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: to this  senior advocate gopal subramanium  representing amazon  said he will take instructions on it as nothing tangible has happened
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: senior advocate darius khambata  representing frl  also said he will take instructions and inform the court
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: amazon has approached the high court seeking to restrain kishore biyani led future group from taking any steps to complete the transaction with entities that are a part of the mukesh dhirubhai ambani  mda  group
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it also sought to restrain future group from taking any steps to transfer or dispose of frl s retail assets or the shares held in frl by the biyanis in any manner without prior written consent of amazon
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the future group and amazon have been locked in a battle after the us based company took frl into the emergency arbitration over alleged breach of a contract between them
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the three domestic firms    frl  fcpl and reliance    have however contended before the high court that if amazon s claim    that it indirectly invested in frl by investing in fcl    was accepted then it would amount to a violation of indian foreign direct investment laws which permit only 10 per cent investment by a foreign entity in the multi brand retail sector
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: according to amazon  the ea award passed under the singapore international arbitration centre  siac  rules is enforceable under section 17 2  of the arbitration and conciliation act
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it referred to an order passed by the high court on december 21  2020  prima facie holding that the ea s award was valid under the indian law
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: senior advocate harish salve  also representing frl  had earlier submitted that amazon had a deal with fcpl and signed an agreement with biyani
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: fcpl has a shareholding agreement with frl which has no agreement with amazon
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: subramanium had urged that frl shall not further precipitate the situation as the matter is being heard by the court
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in the petition  amazon has alleged that future group  kishore biyani and other promoters and directors have  deliberately and maliciously disobeyed the ea award despite it being binding on them and not having challenged it in accordance with the law
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the majority respondents  action of simply ignoring the order  of ea  and continuing with the impugned transaction  deal  is not only contumacious but calls into serious question their respect for enforceability of contracts  the rule of law and the administration of justice
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal
hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it said
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it sought to injunct future group and its officials from taking any steps in furtherance of the deal with reliance
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in august last year  future had reached an agreement to sell its retail  wholesale  logistics and warehousing units to reliance
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the siac on october 25 last year  had passed an interim order in favour of amazon barring frl from taking any step to dispose of or encumber its assets or issuing any securities to secure any funding from a restricted party
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: subsequently  amazon wrote to market regulator sebi  stock exchanges and competition commission of india  cci   urging them to take into consideration the singapore arbitrator s interim decision as it is a binding order  frl had earlier told the high court
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: as per the siac interim order  a three member arbitration panel needs to be set up within 90 days  from the date of the judgement  with one judge each being appointed by future and amazon  along with a third neutral judge
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: on november 10  2020  amazon had told the court that it and fcl have appointed their respective arbitrators
headline: hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal
hc ask if amazon  future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: ads से है परेशान  बिना ads खबरों के लिए इनस्टॉल करें दैनिक भास्कर ऐप  सूर्य पूजा की परंपरा और विज्ञान  पौष महीने में सुबह जल्दी सूर्य को अर्घ्य देने से कम होता है बीमारियों का खतरा  2 महीने पहले    कॉपी लिंक  विज्ञान में भी कहा गया है कि सुबह 7 से 10 के बीच सूरज की रोशनी में खड़े होने से रोग खत्म होते हैं।  हिंदू कैलेंडर के दसवें महीने पौष मास की शुरूआत 31 दिसंबर से हो चुकी है  जो 28 जनवरी तक रहेगा। इस महीने से जुड़ी कई परंपराएं और मान्यताएं धर्म ग्रंथों में बताई गई हैं। धर्म ग्रंथों में बताया गया है कि पौष महीने में भगवान सूर्य की पूजा करनी चाहिए। वैसे तो सूर्यदेव की उपासना रोज करनी चाहिए  लेकिन इस महीने में सूर्य को अर्घ्य देने का विशेष महत्व बताया गया है। ऐसा करने से हर तरह के पाप खत्म होते हैं। बीमारियां भी खत्म होती हैं और उम्र बढ़ती है। पौष महीने के दौरान दिन छोटे होते हैं और रातें बड़ी। इसलिए इस समय सूरज की किरणें शारीरिक और मानसिक रूप से सेहतमंद बनाए रखने के लिए जरूरी होती हैं। यही वजह है कि पौष महीने के दौरान भगवान सूर्य की पूजा की परंपरा बनाई गई है।  पौष महीने का धार्मिक और व्यवहारिक महत्व  वेद में सूर्य को संसार की आत्मा कहा गया है। इसलिए इस महीने में भगवान सूर्य की पूजा करने का विशेष महत्व बताया गया है। हालांकि पौष महीने में शादी विवाह आदि लौकिक उत्सव वर्जित माने गए हैं। इसलिए इन दिनों में सुबह जल्दी जागना चाहिए और सूर्य पूजा करनी चाहिए  सुबह सुबह धूप में बैठना चाहिए। ऐसा करने से हमें धर्म लाभ के साथ ही स्वास्थ्य लाभ भी मिलते हैं। पौष महीने में भगवान सूर्य की पूजा के साथ ही अन्न और अन्य चीजों का दान करना चाहिए। ऐसा करने से लंबी उम्र मिलती है।  पौष माह का वैज्ञानिक और व्यवहारिक महत्व  इस महीने में सुबह जल्दी उठकर तीर्थ स्नान और उदय होते सूर्य की पूजा की परंपरा है। विज्ञान में भी कहा गया है कि सुबह 7 से 10 के बीच सूरज की रोशनी में खड़े होने से रोग खत्म होते हैं।  पौष महीने में शीत ऋतु चरम पर होती है। ठंड ज्यादा होने के कारण स्किन से जुड़ी बीमारियां होने लगती हैं। ठंड की वजह से शरीर में विटामिन डी की कमी हो जाती है  जो सूरज की किरणों से मिलता है। ये सूर्यदेव को अर्घ्य देने और पूजा करने के दौरान जो किरणें शरीर पर पड़ती हैं उनसे मिलता है।  सूरज की रोशनी से मिलने वाली ऊर्जा से मानसिक बीमारियां होने का खतरा भी कम हो जाता है। शीत ऋतु के कारण पाचन शक्ति भी कमजोर हो जाती है। सूरज की किरणों में रहने से वो भी ठीक रहती है।
