line: new delhi  feb 2  ians  nearly 35 per cent smartphones sold globally in the first half of 2020 had hardware security embedded in them  a new report has said
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: apple led the secure chipset market in h1 2020 with 39 per cent share
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: hardware backed security  strong box  means that keys are stored in the secure element  which is a separate microchip
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: a trusted execution environment  tee  is a secure area of the main processor which runs its os and communicates with the main os via a restricted interface
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: the strong box approach is more secure   explained research vice president neil shah
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: apple s portfolio for 2020 has an embedded secure element in the a series chipsets   he added
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: smartphones have become vulnerable to attacks
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: we use them for banking  financial transactions  biometrics  user data and even as digital keys for smart homes and automobiles
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: therefore  the need for hardware security in smartphones is stronger than ever   said research analyst parv sharma
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: hardware security is being adopted not only in the premium segment smartphones but has trickled down to the mid segment as well   he added
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: the sales of secure smartphones declined 6 per cent in h1 2020 compared to h1 2019
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: the decline is due to the outbreak of covid 19 pandemic  which led to reduced overall smartphone sales in h1 2020   sharma noted
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: huawei has also implemented an integrated secure element  inse  in its socs
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: but its share will decline due to us restrictions
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: qualcomm has adopted a secure element as a secure processing unit  spu  in the snapdragon 800 series   shah said
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: qualcomm has also trickled down to the snapdragon 700 series in the mid end segment
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: samsung implements a physically unclonable function  puf  which serves as a unique identifier
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: samsung has also used a quantum random number generator  qrng  in the galaxy a quantum to make the device more secure   shah explained
headline: 35  of smartphones sold in h1 2020 had chipset security  report

line: naypyitaw  myanmar   february 1   following the military coup banks in myanmar have been temporarily shut down due to major disruptions of internet services  according to media reports
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

line: according to a report by the myanmar times  banks under the myanmar banking association have announced a unified closure from february 1
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

line: besides  the atm machines of major banks are also not operating in yangon
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

line: a poor internet connection linked to the state of emergency also affected operations of construction sites in yangon  and many supermarkets in the city decided to cut opening hours and called on residents to refrain from panic buying  sputnik reported
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

line: telecommunications in the capital city of naypyitaw and some other regions and states have also been cut off
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

line: earlier  the myanmar military declared a state of emergency in the country for one year  following the coup  where aung san suu kyi  president u win myint and other senior officials have been detained by the military
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

line: the state power has been handed over to commander in chief of defense services min aung hlaing  while myanmar s first vice president myint swe will serve as the acting president of the country
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

line: the newly elected lower house of the parliament was due to convene on monday  however  the military called for a postponement
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

line: the myanmar military said on monday the new election in the country will be held after the end of one year emergency  which was imposed earlier in the day following the coup by the army leadership
headline: banks closed  atms shut down in myanmar following military coup

headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: the centre has projected a conservative disinvestment target of rs 1
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: 75 lakh crore for fy22 even though bulk of the deals planned in fy21  including the big ticket strategic sale of fuel retailer cum refiner bpcl and the mega initial public offer of life insurance corporation are seen materialising next fiscal
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: strategic disinvestment of air india  shipping corporation of india  container corporation of india  idbi bank  beml  pawan hans and neelachal ispat nigam are also expected to be completed in fy22
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: additionally  privatisation of two public sector banks and one general insurance company to be taken up in fy22  the government said without naming them
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: with covid 19 pandemic playing spoilsport  fy21 disinvestment revenues  revised estimate  will be at a five year low of around rs 32 000 crore or 15  of the massive annual target of rs 2
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: 1 lakh crore
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: unveiling the much awaited strategic disinvestment policy  finance minister nirmala sitharaman said four broad sectors are classified as strategic in which at least one psu is to be retained while the remaining ones can be privatised or merged or closed
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: these sectors are  atomic energy  space and defence  transport and telecommunications  power  petroleum  coal and other minerals  banking  insurance and financial services
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: in non strategic sector  cpses will be privatised or closed
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: the new policy will release a large number of psus for privatisation in the coming years  potentially boosting the centre’s non debt capital receipts for various social sector and developmental programmes
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: as fe had reported earlier  the niti aayog has asked the government to retain control over the country’s top four state run lenders — state bank of india  punjab national bank  bank of baroda and canara bank  even as it recommended that three small public sector banks — punjab   sind bank  bank of maharashtra and uco bank — be privatised on a priority basis
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: sitharaman also announced that an incentive package is being worked out for states to incentivise disinvestment of their psus
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: she also proposed to use a special purpose vehicle in the form of a company to carry out monetisation of idle land with central government departments and psus  either by way of direct sale or concession or by similar means
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: the government’s plan to sell 52
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: 98  stake in bpcl  which was worth about rs 60 000 crore in november 2019  around the time the stake sale proposal  was approved by the union cabinet
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: at the current market prices  the stake is worth about rs 45 150 crore only
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: however  the actual receipts will depend on valuation and consideration of a premium
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: the ipo of lic was the second biggest component of the budgeted disinvestment target for this fiscal
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: while the valuation of the insurer – which often plays white knight to the government – will be known closer to the listing  it is believed to be worth rs 8 11
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: 5 lakh crore  meaning a 10  ipo could fetch the government rs 80 000 110 000 crore
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: after eoi stage  air india privatisation will enter financial bids stage in march april and the officials are optimistic of the deal going through in fy22
headline: union budget 2021  privatisation high on agenda  fy22 target conservative

line: the bids for ai are likely to be under rs 20 000 crore

line: नई दिल्ली। लोन एप्स मामले में बड़ी कार्रवाई करते हुए सेंट्रल क्राइम ब्रांच बेंगलूरु की टीम ने तीन लोगों को गिरफ्तार किया है। इनमें दो आरोपी चीनी नागरिक हैं। सेंट्रल क्राइम ब्रांच की टीम ने इन लोगों को मौजूदा दरों पर ऋण प्रदान करने और बाद में वसूली के लिए धमकी देने या गैर कानूनी तरीका अख्तियार करने से जुड़ा है। क्राइम ब्रांच के अधिकारी चीनी नागरिकों की संलिप्तता को गंभीर मसला मान रहे हैं।  three persons have been arrested in loan apps case

line: involvement of two chinese nationals has been found
headline: bengaluru  crime branch arrested 2 in loan app case  2 chinese citizen included

line: they will be arrested soon  central crime branch  ccb   bengaluru    the matter pertains to the apps providing loans at exorbitant rates   later using threat/force for recovery — ani   ani  december 28  2020  25 दिन पहले रकीब जाकिर की हुई थी गिरफ्तारी  बता दें कि तीन दिसंबर को क्राइम ब्रांच ने बेंगलूरु हिंसा मामले में आरोपी पूर्व पार्षद रकीब जाकिर को गिरफ्तार था। रकीब का नाम बेंगलूरु में 11 अगस्त को डीजे हल्ली और केजे हल्ली हिंसक घटना में सामने आया था। इस मामले में एनआईए अभी तक डीजे हल्ली थाना के मामले में अब तक 124 आरोपियों और केजी हल्ली थाना के मामले में 169 आरोपियों को गिरफ्तार कर चुकी है। बेंगलूरु हिंसक घटना की शुरुआत एक विवादित व भड़काऊ सोशल मीडिया पोस्ट की वजह से हुई थी। इसे कांग्रेस विधायक श्रीनिवास मूर्ति के भतीजे नवीन ने पोस्ट किया था। जिसके बाद 11 अगस्त को बेंगलूरू में हिंसा भड़क गई थी  जिसमें 4 लोगों की मौत हो गई थी
headline: bengaluru  crime branch arrested 2 in loan app case  2 chinese citizen included

line: bank privatisation  केंद्र सरकार ने 4 मिड साइज बैंकों को प्राइवेटाइजेशन के लिए शॉर्टलिस्ट किया है। न्यूज एजेंसी रॉयटर्स की रिपोर्ट के अनुसार  जिन 4 सरकारी बैंकों को सरकार ने प्राइवेटाइजेशन के लिए शॉर्टलिस्ट किया है  उनमें बैंक ऑफ महाराष्ट्र  bank of maharashtra   बैंक ऑफ इंडिया  boi   इंडियन ओवरसीज बैंक और सेंट्रल बैंक ऑफ इंडिया  central bank  का नाम शामिल है। सूत्रों के मुताबिक जल्द ही इन्हें सरकारी से प्राइवेट बनाया जा सकता है।

line: emi  personal loan  home loan लेने वालों के लिए काम की खबर  ये तरीके अपनाएं  होगा जबरदस्त फायदा  emi  personal loan  home loan   हर इंसान के लिए एक अच्छा करियर और खुद का मकान खरीदना एक सपना होता है। घर बनाने के लिए लोग अपने जीवन भर की पूंजी लगा देता है। हालांकि आज के समय में कई सरकारी व प्राइवेट बैंक और निजी कंपनियां होम लोन  home loan  दे रही हैं। घर खरीदने के लिए लोन तो आसानी से मिल जाता है  लेकिन उसकी भारी भरकम emi सालों का भरनी पड़ती है। जिसका असर सीधे तौर पर जेब पर पड़ता है। होम लोन लेने से पहले इस बात का आकलन करें कि सालाना कमाई कितनी है। उस हिसाब से बैंक से कितना लोन मिलेगा। होम लोन की क्षमता उसे चुकाने की क्षमता पर काफी निर्भर करता है। इसमें मासिक आय  खर्च  परिजनों की कमाई  संपत्ति  देनदारी और आय में स्थिरता जैसे स्थितियों को देखा जाता है। बैंक लोन देने से पहले देखता है कि ग्राहक चुकाने में सक्षम है या नहीं। हर महीने कस्टमर को जितने पैसे मिलते हैं  उस हिसाब से लोन की राशि बढ़ जाती है। बैंक संस्थान यह देखती है मासिक आय का 50 प्रतिशत होम लोन की ईएमआई के रूप में दे सकेंगे या नहीं। इसके साथ बैंक होम लोन के लिए उम्र सीमा भी तय कर चलता है। आज हम आपको कुछ ऐसे तरीके बताने जा रहे हैं  जिसे अपनाकर आप अपने होम लोन के भार को कम कर सकते हैं।    होम लोन भुगतान के लिए लंबी अवधि के बजट छोटी अवधि का चयन करे। इसमें आपको लोन में ईएमआई के साथ कुछ अतिरिक्त पैसा जमा करने होंगे। ऐसे करने से ब्याज लागत में कमी होगी। वहीं लोन का समय से पहले भुगतान करना बेहतर विकल्प है।    दूसरे बैंकों के ब्याज दरों पर नजर बनाए रखें। अगर वहां आपके बैंक से कम ब्याज है तो अपना लोन ट्रांसफर करा सकते हैं। हालांकि पेनाल्टी और प्रोसेसिंग शुल्क का भुगतान करना पड़ता है।    होम लोन लंबे समय का लोन होता है। इस अवधि में लोगों के आय में इजाफा भी होता है। अगर कोई वेतनभोगी सैलरी बढ़ने के साथ अतिरिक्त रकम का भुगतान कर सकता है। यह कर्ज चुकाने का अच्छा तरीका होता है। इससे ईएमआई में बढ़ोतरी बड़ा बदलाव लाती है। इससे लोन की बची अवधि को घटाने में भी सहायता मिलती है।    वहीं एक एसआईपी की सहायता से होम का समय से पहले भुगतान किया जा सकता है। अगर 70 लाख रुपए के 0

line: 80 प्रतिशत के लगभग 15 साल के निचले स्तर पर पहुंच गई हैं। आय निरोधक या कम क्रेडिट स्कोर  उच्च ऋण से आय अनुपात  या ऋण पात्रता मानदंडों को पूरा करने में किसी अन्य विफलता के कारण  यदि किसी को उस राशि से इनकार किया जाता है जिसे उसे उधार लेने की आवश्यकता होती है  तो एक रिश्तेदार के साथ संयुक्त ऋण लेना  उस ऋण को प्राप्त करने की पात्रता बढ़ाता है। इसके अलावा  जैसा कि होम लोन आमतौर पर बड़े टिकट आकार के ऋण होते हैं  बहुत से लोग संयुक्त गृह ऋण लेना पसंद करते हैं। उद्योग के विशेषज्ञों का कहना है कि जीवनसाथी के साथ संयुक्त गृह ऋण  या माता पिता  भाई बहन और बच्चों जैसे अन्य करीबी रिश्तेदारों के साथ संयुक्त ऋण के लिए अनुमोदन प्राप्त करना आसान है। एक सह आवेदक के साथ एक संयुक्त गृह ऋण के लिए जाना  जिसके पास एक बेहतर क्रेडिट प्रोफ़ाइल है  उधारकर्ता के ऋण को अनुमोदित होने की संभावना को बढ़ा सकता है  उसी समय उच्च राशि के लिए योग्य हो सकता है।  कुछ बैंकों के लिए  होम लोन के लिए सह आवेदक होना भी अनिवार्य है  जबकि कुछ ऋणदाता सह स्वामी के सह आवेदक होने पर भी जोर देते हैं। ध्यान दें कि इसका मतलब यह नहीं है कि सह आवेदक को सह मालिक होना चाहिए। एक सह आवेदक ऋण चुकाने के लिए उत्तरदायी है  यदि प्राथमिक आवेदक इसे सेवा देने में असमर्थ है  जबकि संपत्ति का एक सह स्वामी किसी और के साथ संपत्ति साझा करता है। इसलिए  एक पति या पत्नी या रिश्तेदार के साथ एक संयुक्त गृह ऋण लेने पर अपने स्वयं के लाभ और भत्ते के साथ आता है।  एक संयुक्त ऋण की तुलना में  एक व्यक्तिगत ऋण के लिए  उधारकर्ता को एक ऋण सीमा की पेशकश की जाएगी जो बहुत कम होगी। उदाहरण के लिए  एक उधारकर्ता ऋण राशि प्राप्त कर सकता है जो रिश्तेदार / पति / पत्नी की सीमा के साथ संयुक्त होने पर 60 से 70 लाख रुपये तक जा सकती है  जबकि व्यक्तिगत रूप से वह 30 40 लाख रुपये के ऋण के लिए पात्र होगा। इसके साथ ही  उधारकर्ताओं को उनके गृह ऋण पर अतिरिक्त रियायतें भी मिलती हैं। मिसाल के तौर पर  अगर पत्नी होम लोन की प्राथमिक आवेदक है  तो लोन सस्ती दर पर आ सकता है  क्योंकि ज्यादातर बैंक महिला कर्जदारों को कम ब्याज दर देते हैं।  उधारकर्ता भी कर लाभ में वृद्धि का आनंद ले सकते हैं  और अधिकांश व्यक्ति कर लाभ लेने के लिए संयुक्त ऋण का विकल्प चुनते हैं। उदाहरण के लिए line: different stories  the same ideology  undeniably  there are similarities  but if the parallel is attractive  we must beware of hasty identifications
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: we must never forget that in france  the national front  fn  was founded by former collaborationists and other ss  neofascist militants of the new order and the statutes were deposited by pierre bousquet
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: from its birth  this political movement  led by jean marie le pen  an extreme poujadist  was based on a deep racism  a visceral hatred of the left and of the workers’ movement  and the call for an authoritarian state
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism
lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: all its ideological construction reflects obvious links with fascism
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: to take just one example  it should be noted that the historic logo of the fn  the flame  is directly inspired by the italian movement msi  an italian neofascist party  founded in 1946 by people close to mussolini
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: in the case of donald trump  he came to politics late  being first a more or less crooked businessman  member of the democratic party  before running for the republican primaries in 2015
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: from the start  he multiplied the attacks against minorities  not hesitating to use excess to radicalize his electoral base against a background of racism  xenophobia  misogyny  where the former american president  initially advised by steve bannon  an ideologue claiming the heritage of the nazi thinker julius evola   has shown a closeness to violent and racist extreme right wing groups  proud boys  etc
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: marine le pen claims to have been working for years towards  demonization   attempting to conceal its proximity to small groups like génération identitaire or the gud  even though the links are obvious  and not only in terms of ideology
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: the objective of  lepenism  is obvious  to present a respectable face to popularize the ultra reactionary ideas of the french far right and thus to conquer political power
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: while fundamental differences exist  some similarities can be noted
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: in addition to xenophobic and racist speeches  as well as a call to restore order and security in defiance of public freedoms  these currents have a recurring practice of lying
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: according to a statement made by the washington post as of july 9  2020  trump had uttered 20 055 false information
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: in france  jean marie le pen  and today marine le pen  have implemented the same strategy to saturate the media space
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: for years  the president of the rn has  for example  repeated that a credit card is distributed to all migrants upon their arrival in europe
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: we know this is wrong
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: as recently as last week  a member of the european parliament  jean lin lacapelle  claimed  that no one under the age of 44 had died from the new coronavirus
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: again  this is a huge lie
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: thanks to the significant presence of the far right in the  big  media and on social networks  it has achieved the feat of convincing part of the population  by relying on a very understandable mistrust
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: ‘regard to media subservient to large capitalist groups
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: trumpism and lepenism do not have the same history and operate in different contexts  but they are both extremely dangerous in that they play hard on the map of the  racialization  of social problems  pointing to the stranger as the cause of all the evils of society
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: two movements to fight therefore  in the heads  in the street as in the ballot box
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: postfascism and confusionism  extreme right  trumpism  and extreme right  marine lepenism   in their intersections and their crossroads  draw the new faces of an ultraconservatism that has enjoyed a certain attractiveness on an international scale since the mid 2000s  by benefiting the blurring of previously stabilized political benchmarks and increasing the fog a little more
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: intersections  xenophobia and hostility to the pluricultural and mixed tendencies of modern societies on a nationalist background  the fetishization of a compact people nation and largely closed in on itself largely fantasized  abuse of the superficial provocations of the  politically incorrect  and of the false conspiracy lucidity instead of radical social criticism
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: cross over  the american extreme right is slipping on the slopes of sexism and homophobia the most uninhibited  even anti semitism  while in search of respectability the french extreme right is police on these lands yet traditional for it
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: fascism or populism then  staying hooked on the first term would make us risk the folklorization of an evil that would repeat itself over and over again in the same forms  without regard for the work of history
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: the second  with multiple and vague uses  between an automatic mode of stigmatization of the popular for some and demand for a positive incarnation of the people by elites who do not recognize themselves as such for others  does not allow us to understand the continuities with fascism
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: historical  thus relativizing the danger
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: the notion of  postfascism  would make it easier to grasp both continuities  in  postfascism   there is  fascism   and discontinuities  the  post    and in particular the reappropriation of the republican and democratic lexicon   république     popular sovereignty  merged with  national sovereignty     freedom  and  equality     secularism    etc
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: out of step with the anti republican and anti democratic discourse in progress in the 1930s
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: however  the extreme right wing brought about by both trumpism and lepenism does not work by their own strength  but also thanks to the paralysis  ambiguities and confusions on the left
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: the extension of the fields of confusionism  that is to say the development of lexical and ideological interferences between extreme right  right  moderate left and radical left  especially benefits ultra conservatism
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: when we put forward the nation and the borders  while denigrating the world and suspecting migrants  when some legitimize forms of stigmatization of islam and others underestimate anti semitism  when we are tempted by   bonnet blanc et blanc bonnet  between penism and macronism  when we use the strings of conspiracy to bounce back on the political scene  when the demonization of the media replaces the deployment of the emancipatory imagination  etc
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: we unconsciously participate in weave the web of rhetoric likely to suffocate us
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: and let’s not forget that figures from the left publicly expressed a certain fascination with trump at the time of his election in 2016… what if we instead reinvented an emancipation left
headline: lepenism  a french style trumpism

line: flyblade india ने हाल ही में मुम्बई और yoo villas हेलीपैड के बीच हेलीकॉप्टर सेवाएं शुरू कीं  पुणे  भारत  7 दिसम्बर  2020 /prnewswire/    yoo villas पुणे की अब भारत की वित्तीय राजधानी मुम्बई से नजदीकी और भी बढ़ गई है  जिसका श्रेय flyblade india द्वारा पुणे में yoo villas हेलीपैड और मुम्बई के बीच शुरू की गई दैनिक हेलीकॉप्टर सेवाओं को जाता है।  हालांकि yoo villas के बहुत सारे मालिक पुणे के हैं  लेकिन मुम्बईवासी भी अब मुम्बई में अपने घरों के पास एक प्राइवेट विला ले सकते हैं  जो नई लांच की गई हेलीकॉप्टर सेवा की शानदार हवाई संपर्क सुविधा से जुड़ गया है।  yoo villas भारत का पहला और एकमात्र yoo  ब्रांड वाला विला एन्क्लेव है और यह दुनिया का पहला ऐसा yoo villas प्रोजेक्ट भी है जिसे जानी मानी डिज़ाइनर kelly hoppen द्वारा संवारा गया है।  kelly hoppen ब्रिटेन की जानी मानी डिजाइनर हैं  जिन्होंने gwyneth paltrow  elton john  madonna  david और victoria beckham आदि के घरों के अलावा ब्रिटेन के शाही परिवार के सदस्यों के घरों को भी डिजाइन किया है।  yoo villas को भारत में ब्रांडेड रेजिडेंस स्पेस में अग्रणी कंपनी panchshil realty द्वारा पेश किया गया है।  पूर्वी पुणे में खरड़ी के उभरते आईटी कॉरीडोर के पास स्थित  yoo villas एक पांच सितारा गेटेड एन्क्लेव है  जिसमें पूर्वी और पश्चिमी अंदाज का तालमेल कायम करते हुए विशिष्ट अद्वितीय दोमंजिले विला निर्मित किए गए हैं।  ये villas तीन साइज़ वाले विकल्पों में हैं  और हर एक भव्य विला को आधुनिक सुख सुविधाओं के साथ ऐसे स्पेस के रूप में सुसज्जित किया गया है  जहां बेजोड़ लग्जरी और आकर्षक भव्यता की हर एक बारीकी का पूरा ख्याल रखा गया है।  मंत्रमुग्ध करने वाले इंटीरियर स्टाइल विकल्पों   सी ब्रीज़ और विंटेज  के साथ  अत्याधुनिक yoo villas सभी आधुनिक सुख सुविधाओं और बेजोड़ वैभव से लैस हैं।  अंतर्राष्ट्रीय ख्यातिप्राप्त डिज़ाइनर kelly hoppen को 40 वर्षों से अधिक का अनुभव प्राप्त है और डिजाइन लग्जरी के क्षेत्र में वे अग्रणी हैं। उन्होंनें नौ किताबें भी लिखी हैं और tv की जानी मानी हस्ती हैं जो bbc tv के dragon s den में निवेशक के रूप में तथा अन्य शो में आती हैं। उन्होंने डिजाइन संबंधी अनेक पुरस्कार प्राप्त किए हैं और 2009 में mbe किया था।  इस वर्ष इंग्लैण्ड की महारानी की 2020 बर्थडे ऑनर्स लिस्ट के अंतर्गत kelly को  एक उद्यमी तथा स्वयं विकसित महिला कारोबारी मालिक के रूप में uk के लिए अप्रतिम योगदान हेतु  cbe  कमांडर ऑफ दि ब्रिटिश एम्पायर  के रूप में सम्मानित किया गया।  खूबसूरत नदी तटवर्ती स्थानों पर परिष्कृत अद्वितीय अनुभवों और शांतिपूर्ण रहन सहन प्रेरित करने के लिए निर्मित yoo villas उन लोगों के लिए डिज़ाइन किए गए हैं  जो विशिष्ट प्रकार की जीवनशैली में रूचि रखते हैं। यहां आपको सर्वोत्तम प्रेरक और मनमोहक परिवेश और शांतिपूर्ण माहौल मिलेगा  जहां अपने सपनों के घर में आप अपने जीवन का सचमुच भरपूर आनंद ले सकते हैं। yoo villas के लिए प्रेरणाओं के बारे में kelly की बात सुनने के लिए कृपया यहां क्लिक करें। click here  हरे भरे परिवेश में और सर्वोत्तम सुख सुविधाओं से लैस  yoo villas प्रकृति से तालमेल में जीवनयापन के लिए डिज़ाइन और सुसज्जित किए गए हैं।  सजाए संवारे बगीचों  भरपूर पार्किंग जगह  जलधाराओं  जल विशिष्टताओं  खेल क्षेत्रों  और मन को राहत देने वाली शांतिपूर्ण जगहों से सुसज्जित  central park  ।  · पेड़ों की कतारों वाले मार्ग  पेड़ों के कारण छायादार साइडवाक  जॉगिंग और वॉकिंग ट्रैक  सिट आउट्‌स  वाटर फीचर्स और मौसमी फल फूलों से लदी हरियाली से भरपूर बेमिसाल दृश्यावलियां  ये सब आपको प्रकृति से एकाकार महसूस कराते हैं।  हाल ही में fly blade india pvt

line: ने पुणे में panchshil के yoo villas हेलीपैड से पुणे और मुम्बई के बीच दैनिक हेलीकॉप्टर सेवा की शुरूआत कर दी है। यह हेलीकॉप्टर सेवा  फ्लाई बाई सीट वाला समाधान है  जिसमें उपयोक्ताओं को बस मनचाही संख्या में सीटों के लिए भुगतान करना होगा  जैसा कि वे किसी कॉमर्शियल एयरलाइन से उड़ान भरते समय करते हैं। yoo villas का हेलीपैड विला एन्क्लेव के पास स्थित है  इसलिए आप अब हवाई मार्ग से अपने दरवाजे पर सीधे पहुंच सकते हैं और अपनी विला में जा सकते हैं। वर्तमान में यह हेलीकॉप्टर सेवा  पुणे और मुम्बई के बीच उपलब्ध एकमात्र हवाई संपर्क विकल्प है।  fly blade india अभी yoo villas हेलीपैड  पुणे से मुम्बई तक प्रतिदिन दो सेवाएं  और मुम्बई से yoo villas के हेलीपैड तक प्रतिदिन दो सेवाएं दे रही है। ये सेवाएं  दक्षिण मुम्बई में महालक्ष्मी रेसकोर्स और जुहू उपनगर से चलाई जाएंगी। शेड्‌यूल और ट्रैवेल कंसीर्ज़ सेवाओं सहित हेलीकॉप्टर सेवाओं के बारे में अधिक जानकारी के लिए कृपया fly blade india से 1 800 102 5233 पर या ईमेल customerservice flyblade

line: addressing a press conference here  he said   this budget is a different budget altogether
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: it is a transformational budget  it is a future ready budget for railway  it is a path breaking budget
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma said the focus of this budget is on deliverance  commitment to delivery  time schedule  focus on customers  focus on technology  induction to provide better services to customers  better passenger and freight services
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: highlighting the works of the railways during the covid pandemic  he said   during the year  we have been able to make significant change in our working
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: during this difficult time of covid pandemic  we could transport essential commodities from one part of the country to other
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: we also took initiative in moving our migrants
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he stressed that the covid was a difficult time  but railways used it as an opportunity
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: there was a large number of works which we did during covid pandemic  by removing bottlenecks  repairs and rehabilitation of assets   he said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma also said that the works resulted in the average speed of the trains showing a dramatic growth in doubling the speed of the freight trains from 23 kmph to 46 kmph
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: on the details of the budget announced by union finance minister nirmala sitharaman in lok sabha  he said   indian railways has now highest ever total plan capex of rs 2 15 058 crore this year with rs 7 500 crore from internal resources  rs 1 00 258 crore from extra budgetary resources and rs 1 07 100 crore for capital expenditure allocation given in the general budget
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that the railways received a record outlay of rs 1 10 055 crore  of which rs 1 07 100 crore is for capital expenditure
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: the gross budgetary allocation is rs 37 050 crore higher than be 2020 21  which is 53 per cent
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: inspite of the covid  this is remarkable vindication of the progress being made being undertaken in infrastructure projects in railways   sharma said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: with this increase in capex  indian railways will be the driver of indian economy
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: the thrust of annual plan 2021 22 is on infrastructure development  throughput enhancement  development of terminal facilities  augmentation of speed of trains  signaling systems  improvement of passengers or users  amenities  safety works of road over or under bridges etc   he said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: discussing the national rail plan  he said the nrp envisages the plan for railways for 2050 for which the infrastructure needs to be prepared by 2030
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma also said that national projects of jammu and kashmir  himachal pradesh  uttarakhand and north eastern region have been allocated highest ever outlay of rs 12 985 crore
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that in budget estimate of 2021 22 against the revised estimate of 2020 21 of rs 7 535 crore  there is an increase of 72 per cent
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that rs 37 270 crore of gross budgetary support has been allocated for investment in psu/jv/spvs  with allocation for dfccil at rs 16 086 crore  for national high speed rail corporation ltd  nhsrcl  at rs 14 000 crore and kolkata metro rail corporation ltd  kmrcl  at rs 900 crore
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: highlighting the projects which the railways completed last year  he said   during the covid pandemic  we completed some important projects like connecting the railway line to kevadia in gujarat for the statue of unity  inauguration of over 650 km of dedicated freight corridor  dfc
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that railways are hopeful of completing another 500 km of dfc by this financial year and complete the entire project by june 2022
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he also said that wheel production will also be indigenised in rae bareli  as well as vande bharat train sets  track machines  and also the train collision avoidance system  tcas
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: we have started using tcas for 250 km of south central railway and for 1 200 km of sanctioned work is going on
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: and we plan to cover the high density network and high utility network in coming years   sharma said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: prime minister narendra modi on monday assured his israeli counterpart benjamin netanyahu of punishing the perpetrators of the minor bomb blast that took place near the israeli embassy here on january 29
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: pm modi further said that india gives high importance to the safety and security of israeli diplomats and embassy
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: according to an official statement by the prime minister s office  during a telephonic conversation pm modi assured his counterpart that india accords the highest importance to the safety and security of israeli diplomats and premises  and would deploy all its resources to find and punish the perpetrators
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: both leaders expressed satisfaction about the close coordination between indian and israeli security agencies in this context   the statement said
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: the leaders also spoke on fighting against the coronavirus pandemic together
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: the two leaders also briefed each other about the progress of the fight against covid 19 pandemic in their respective countries  and discussed possibilities of further collaboration in this area   the pmo added
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: on january 29  a low intensity explosion took place near the israel embassy
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: no injuries have been reported in the incident so far
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: windscreens of several cars parked in the vicinity of the embassy on dr apj abdul kalam road were found damaged
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: the explosion took place not far from vijay chowk  where several vvips including president ram nath kovind  prime minister narendra modi were in attendance during the  beating retreat  ceremony
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: the envelope has a text related to an israel embassy official
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: it is a case for investigating officers to see whether or not it has any link with the case
headline: pm modi assures israel pm of punishing perpetrators of bomb blast

line: but  it has been recovered from the blast site   a senior government official told ani

line: new delhi  feb 1  pti  the delhi high court monday sought to know whether us based e commerce giant amazon and kishore biyani led future retail ltd  frl  were open to resolving the issue arising out of rs 24 713 crore deal between frl and reliance retail
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the counsel for both  amazon and future group  submitted that they would seek instructions and inform the court on tuesday
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the court was hearing a plea by amazon seeking direction to order enforcement of the award by singapore s emergency arbitrator  ea  restraining frl from going ahead with its rs 24 713 crore deal with reliance retail
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: amazon
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: com nv investment holdings llc  in its plea  also sought detention of the biyanis  directors of future coupons pvt ltd  fcpl  and frl and other related parties in civil prison and attaching of their properties for alleged  wilful disobedience  of the emergency arbitrator s order
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: justice j r midha asked the parties to inform it on tuesday if any such endeavour could be made and clarified that this should not be taken as deferring the proceedings and it would continue as scheduled
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the court  which asked if any attempt has been made to resolve the issue  suggested that if parties would be willing  it can refer the matter to two retired judges of the supreme court
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the court also said it will consider whatever protective order can be passed
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in commercial matters  it is always helpful to find a solution   it said
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: to this  senior advocate gopal subramanium  representing amazon  said he will take instructions on it as nothing tangible has happened
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: senior advocate darius khambata  representing frl  also said he will take instructions and inform the court
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: amazon has approached the high court seeking to restrain kishore biyani led future group from taking any steps to complete the transaction with entities that are a part of the mukesh dhirubhai ambani  mda  group
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it also sought to restrain future group from taking any steps to transfer or dispose of frl s retail assets or the shares held in frl by the biyanis in any manner without prior written consent of amazon
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the future group and amazon have been locked in a battle after the us based company took frl into the emergency arbitration over alleged breach of a contract between them
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the three domestic firms    frl  fcpl and reliance    have however contended before the high court that if amazon s claim    that it indirectly invested in frl by investing in fcl    was accepted then it would amount to a violation of indian foreign direct investment laws which permit only 10 per cent investment by a foreign entity in the multi brand retail sector
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: according to amazon  the ea award passed under the singapore international arbitration centre  siac  rules is enforceable under section 17 2  of the arbitration and conciliation act
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it referred to an order passed by the high court on december 21  2020  prima facie holding that the ea s award was valid under the indian law
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: senior advocate harish salve  also representing frl  had earlier submitted that amazon had a deal with fcpl and signed an agreement with biyani
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: fcpl has a shareholding agreement with frl which has no agreement with amazon
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: subramanium had urged that frl shall not further precipitate the situation as the matter is being heard by the court
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in the petition  amazon has alleged that future group  kishore biyani and other promoters and directors have  deliberately and maliciously disobeyed  the ea award despite it being binding on them and not having challenged it in accordance with the law
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the majority respondents  action of simply ignoring the order  of ea  and continuing with the impugned transaction  deal  is not only contumacious but calls into serious question their respect for enforceability of contracts  the rule of law and the administration of justice
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal
hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it said
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: it sought to injunct future group and its officials from taking any steps in furtherance of the deal with reliance
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: in august last year  future had reached an agreement to sell its retail  wholesale  logistics and warehousing units to reliance
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: the siac on october 25 last year  had passed an interim order in favour of amazon barring frl from taking any step to dispose of or encumber its assets or issuing any securities to secure any funding from a restricted party
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: subsequently  amazon wrote to market regulator sebi  stock exchanges and competition commission of india  cci   urging them to take into consideration the singapore arbitrator s interim decision as it is a binding order  frl had earlier told the high court
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: as per the siac interim order  a three member arbitration panel needs to be set up within 90 days  from the date of the judgement  with one judge each being appointed by future and amazon  along with a third neutral judge
headline: hc ask if amazon future open to resolve issue relating to reliance deal

line: on november 10  2020  amazon had told the court that it and fcl have appointed their respective arbitrators

line: recently  when i opened instagram  i noticed that the usual spot for checking notifications is now a shop tab
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: the instagram blog post announcing the redesign said that the change will support small businesses and connect people with their favourite brands and creators
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: this made me pause
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: as a researcher who studies social media  people and society  i am concerned about the effects of surveillance capitalism
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: this includes social media companies profiting from collecting user data  making algorithmic inferences about people’s preferences and using this information to target people with advertising
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: features like instagram’s shop tab facilitate surveillance capitalism  so it is important to look at their consequences
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: many people use instagram to share their lives with other people  but the redesign is shifting the nature of the social media platform toward online commerce
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: this shift opens people to highly targeted advertising and makes them vulnerable to advertising that exploits their emotional experiences
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: shift to shopping  research  including my own  shows that people use instagram to record their big and mundane moments  find community  exchange social support  express identities and keep in touch with friends
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: in 2017  colleagues and i showed how ad hoc communities form around the tag  depression on the platform  and how much of the discourse is to make sense of the experience of depression  record it  share it with others and exchange support with other people dealing with depression
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: i argued that it is important for the platform to recognise the value users find in these communities and support them  rather than ban or nudge them to go elsewhere when they come to the platform to express themselves and build solidarity
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: the notification button  represented as a heart icon  brings up a screen that indicates the interactions people have had with your instagram presence – for example  who has liked your posts and comments
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: it is likely that the notification button was the most frequently clicked tab
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: when people interact with technology  they form habits
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: i am probably not the only one clicking the new shop tab when i mean to click the notification button
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: it is possible that the company did this simply to ensure that instagram users encounter the new feature  but there are other ways to accomplish that
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: by choosing to make the shop tab central to its platform  instagram is sending its users a message  this platform is a business  and interactions on this platform are going to be commodified
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: though some people may come to instagram to find things to buy  many do not
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: app designers can provide an unneeded feature and create a need for it over time
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: this is not without precedence in the context of social media and shopping
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: for example  when facebook  which owns instagram  relaunched facebook marketplace in 2016  the marketplace product manager  bowen pan  said   we show you the most relevant items for you  even if you do not know what you want
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: potential harms  people share all kinds of personal information on instagram  such as mental health  physical health  traumatic events  pregnancy  loss  infertility  becoming new parents and getting married
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: social media companies’ access to such sensitive information is a concern  for how the companies could exploit the information and the risk of third party access to the data
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: instagram can use computational techniques to infer people’s affective states – their emotions and moods – based on many signals available to the platform
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: these include what content users view and post
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: there is substantial evidence that emotions and affective states play a key role in advertising
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: while capitalising on emotions and emotional personal experiences for profit is not unique to social media or algorithms  the data driven  opaque and hyperpersonalised approaches boost the scale of potential harm
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: presumably  what people see in instagram’s shop is personalised based on what the platform’s recommendation algorithm determines they would like and be inclined to purchase
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: how does the inferred socioeconomic  gender  age  race and other attributes shape what the platform recommends to users in the shop tab  what shops get to be recommended and visible  instagram users can be as young as 13  the age required to open an account
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: how does personalisation work for children  how does this feature affect the experience of individuals with low socioeconomic status  what principles and values is the platform adhering to in designing these recommendation algorithms  staff picks and other means of presenting products   a major consideration is when people get recommendations to purchase items during vulnerable moments
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: sharing or seeking information about a difficult  personal experience on a social media platform and then having the platform capitalise on an algorithmic understanding of the experience – which might or might not be accurate – is problematic
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: what are the implications for impulsive buyers who may turn to instagram as a space for community and peer support to resist impulsive purchasing  but who are instead confronted with things to purchase and have no way of opting out  how about for someone who is on the platform to find support while coping with a substance use disorder  but instead encounters recommendations to purchase items related to drinking  what happens if a person posting about experiences with pregnancy loss begins seeing ads for baby clothes  this last scenario has happened
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: in recent and upcoming studies  i observed that  to varying degrees  people find social media platforms capitalising on their personal  intimate experiences – especially those associated with negative emotions – manipulative and harmful
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: social media platform designers and decision makers should consider ways to address potential harms preemptively rather than retroactively
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: the instagram blog post announcing the shop feature states that there are marketers and influencers on the platform and young people who want to purchase the same products their favourite creators use
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: this might be a need for some instagram users  but not all
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: if instagram is determined to emphasise shopping  and if opting in is not possible  i believe the company should allow users to opt out of the shop feature
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: losing personal connections  recent research has shown that people share less and less personal information on facebook  which has had its marketplace feature since 2016  and use platforms like instagram to engage in more personal  intimate discourse
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: this is due in part to site features and whom people are connected to on each platform
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: by moving away from a focus on people and their connections  and by commodifying and potentially manipulating users to purchase items on the platform  instagram could go down the road that facebook did – fewer personal connections and less personal  meaningful content
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: instagram’s website states that it is  bringing you closer to the people and things you love
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: but people and things are different phenomena  and the ways people feel closer to each other are different from the ways they are drawn to things  businesses and brands
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: by wanting to do both  or perhaps by using the former to benefit the latter  the company may be missing the mark on how to bring people closer together
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: nazanin andalibi is an assistant professor  school of information  university of michigan
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: this article first appeared on the conversation
headline: scroll core n            in australia  google is running an experiment on some of its search engine users

line: jerusalem  feb 1  pti  israeli prime minister benjamin netanyahu on monday thanked his indian counterpart narendra modi for his government s efforts to protect israeli representatives following the terrorist incident near the country s embassy in new delhi last week
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: a minor improvised explosive device  ied  blast took place near the israeli embassy in new delhi on friday evening
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: no one was injured
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: i spoke to my friend indian prime minister narendra modi and thanked him for his government s efforts to protect israeli representatives following the terrorist incident near the israeli embassy in india   netanyahu wrote in a tweet
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: prime minister modi noted that his country is committed to the security of our people and that india will continue to cooperate with israel in the fight against terrorism   he added
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: on his part  prime minister modi assured netanyahu that the attack near the israeli mission  will be fully investigated and perpetrators brought to justice
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: our close and valuable security cooperation will continue
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: we also discussed our healthcare cooperation in the context of covid 19   modi tweeted
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: netanyahu congratulated modi on the production of vaccines in india and the start of the vaccines operation there
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: modi also congratulated netanyahu on the successful vaccines operation in israel
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: the two leaders discussed possible cooperation in the production and supply of vaccines to israel and the mutual recognition of certificates of vaccination   the israeli prime minister s office said
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: on friday  netanyahu had expressed  full confidence  in the indian authorities in ensuring the safety of israelis and jews in india following the blast that occurred about 150 metres away from the embassy in the very high security lutyens  bungalow zone
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: some cars were damaged in the blast
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: the israeli foreign ministry said all its diplomats and embassy staff in delhi are  safe and sound
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: netanyahu through his national security adviser meir ben shabbat  who spoke to his indian counterpart ajit doval  conveyed to modi that he has full confidence that the indian authorities will do a thorough investigation of the incident and ensure the safety of israelis and jews who are there
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: external affairs minister s jaishankar also spoke to his israeli counterpart gabi ashkenazi and assured him of  fullest protection  to diplomats and the mission
headline: netanyahu thanks pm modi for efforts to protect israeli representatives following blast near embassy

line: 96 लाख रुपये था। इस तरह से यह वास्तव में बड़े मूल्य वाले भुगतान की बेहतर प्रणाली साबित हुआ है।  आरटीजीएस वित्तीय लेनदेन के लिए सर्वश्रेष्ठ संदेश मानक आईएसओ 20022 का इस्तेमाल करता है। आरटीजीएस में लाभार्थी के खाते में पैसा पहुंचने की पुष्टि का फीचर भी उपलब्ध है। शुरुआत में रिजर्व बैंक ने नेफ्ट और आरटीजीएस प्रणाली के जरिये लेनदेन पर कोई शुल्क नहीं लगाया था।  यह कदम देश में डिजिटल लेनदेन को प्रोत्साहन देने के लिए उठाया गया था। इसके अलावा रिजर्व बैंक ने बैंकों से इसका लाभ ग्राहकों को देने को कहा था।  अब रिजर्व बैंक आरटीजीएस और नेफ्ट के जरिये लेनदेन के लिए बैंकों पर न्यूनतम शुल्क लगाता है। वहीं बैंक ग्राहकों पर शुल्क लगाते हैं।   यह सिंडिकेटेड न्यूज़ फीड से अनएडिटेड और ऑटो जेनरेटेड स्टोरी है  ऐसी संभावना है कि लेटेस्टली स्टाफ द्वारा इसमें कोई बदलाव या एडिट नहीं किया गया है

line: diabetes during pregnancy can cause problems for both baby and mother
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: some women may develop high blood sugar levels during pregnancy  a condition that is known as gestational diabetes mellitus  gdm
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: this can increase the odds of pregnancy complications like c section  preterm birth and even stillbirth
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: diabetes during pregnancy can also cause the babies to grow too large and lead to excessive birth weight
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: babies born to mothers with gestational diabetes are may be at increased risk of respiratory distress syndrome  low blood sugar  hypoglycemia   obesity and type 2 diabetes later in life
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: also read   doctors successfully deliver 649 grams premature baby  know all about this rare case  studies have also shown that women with gestational diabetes have a higher risk of developing high blood pressure and preeclampsia during pregnancy and type 2 diabetes later in life
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: also read   coronary heart disease  reasons why women experience worse outcomes after bypass surgery  if you have or had diabetes during pregnancy  you’re more likely to develop heart disease later in life  according to a new study
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: also read   egg freezing on rise in india  is it the best choice to make  know the pros and cons  gestational diabetes linked to heart artery calcification  in the new study  researchers from kaiser permanente in california  us found that women with a history of gestational diabetes were twice as likely to develop calcium in heart arteries – which is a strong predictor of heart disease – by mid life
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: surprisingly  the risk of heart artery calcification remains even if even if they maintain normal blood sugar levels after pregnancy  said co author erica p
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: gunderson from kaiser permanente
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: the study results appeared in circulation  journal of the american heart association
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: for the study  the researchers followed approximately 1 100 women without type 1 or type 2 diabetes for 25 years which ended in 2011
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: after the 25 year follow up  it was found that women who had diabetes during pregnancy had a two fold higher risk of coronary artery calcification  regardless of whether they had healthy blood sugar levels  pre diabetes or type 2 diabetes
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: as many as 36 per cent women with a history of gestational diabetes in the study developed pre diabetes while 26 per cent developed type 2 diabetes  the researchers said
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: how to prevent gestational diabetes  it is not fully understood as to why some women develop diabetes during pregnancy
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: unfortunately  gestational diabetes can’t be prevented entirely  but the risk can be reduced by staying healthy before and during pregnancy
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: to lower your risk for gestational diabetes  it is important to know the factors that can contribute to developing the condition
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: below are the risk factors associated with gestational diabetes   being overweight and obese  inactive lifestyle  gestational diabetes during a previous pregnancy  existing heath conditions that cause insulin resistance  such as polycystic ovarian syndrome  pcos  and the skin disorder acanthosis nigricans  having an immediate family member with type 2 diabetes  high blood pressure prior to pregnancy  excessive weight gain during a current or previous pregnancy  being pregnant with multiples  like twins or triplets  previously delivering a baby weighing more than 9 pounds  4
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: 1 kilograms
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: women belonging to some ethnic groups such as african americans  asian americans  hispanics  native americans  pacific islanders have a higher risk of developing gestational diabetes
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: so  if you’re overweight  try to lose weight before planning a baby to lower your risk for gestational diabetes
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: a healthy diet combined with regular exercise is the best way to lose weight
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: even if you’re not overweight  try to establish a regular physical activity – a moderate exercise for at least 30 minutes at least three times a week may help
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: include a lot of vegetables  fruits  and whole grains in your diet to stay healthy and prepare your body for pregnancy
headline: women with a history diabetes during pregnancy more likely to develop heart disease

line: the budget announcements by the finance minister  made in the background of the pandemic  have largely been on expected lines expect that the fiscal deficit number has turned out to be much larger than expected
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: the expectation was that the fiscal deficit in the current year would be 7
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: 5 per cent  which turned out to be 9
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: 5 per cent of gdp
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: for 2021 22  the expectation is that the budget deficit will be kept around 5
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: 5 per cent of gdp  but the finance minister has projected a higher fiscal deficit number of 6
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: 8 per cent of gdp
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this increase can be attributed to the fact that the government has decided to discontinue the practice of giving loans to the food corporation of india  fci  and bring the subsidy to fci transparently in the budget number
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this has increased the deficit number by about 1 per cent
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this is  however  welcome and in the interest of fiscal transparency and data integrity
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: the policy premise of the budget  which was also elaborated in the economic survey  is that the job and output multiplier effects of non defence expenditures should be harnessed without worrying about inflation and borrowing cost  especially when the global market is awash with liquidity
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: based on this philosophy  capital allocation in infrastructure segment like roads  railways  shipping and petroleum has been substantially enhanced
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: in order to access low cost long term pension and insurance fund  the government has also decided to create a development financial institution  dfi  for which legislation is being brought in this session of parliament
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this institution will leverage its capital to attract global funds for completion of more than 7 000 projects identified in the national infrastructure pipeline
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: the second important feature of the budget is the proposed financial reforms
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: here  the government has decided to bite the bullet by announcing the privatisation of two public sector banks which would require amendment to the bank nationalisation act
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this is a bold move  which was suggested by many economists as the most viable way forward
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: further  the government has also decided to create a bad bank in the form of an arc  asset reconstruction company  and amc  asset management corporation  to take in its account all the npas of banks and nbfcs
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: here  the design of the bad bank is important
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: ideally  it should be tested in the private sector and comprise a set of specialised bad banks for sectors like real estate and power so that the management can be vested with experts who can extract the best value out of these bad assets
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: third  the government has used the opportunity of the covid crisis to substantially hike the investment in the health sector from about 1
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: 5 per cent of gdp to 2
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: 5 per cent
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this is being done through a centrally sponsored health scheme named ‘prime minister atmanirbhar swasth bharat yojana’  at an outlay of ₹64 180 crore
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this amount would be used to strengthen the testing laboratories of primary health centres and other medical institutions
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this scheme is also being combined with another to improve access to water and have better sewage facilities in urban india
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: this is an important initiative in the area of preventive healthcare  most of the diseases in india can be traced to poor water quality contributed by inadequate sewage facility
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: the improved infrastructure will help indians reduce their out of pocket health expenditure which  at 65 per cent  is the highest in the world
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: in the announcement made in part b of the budget speech  there were no major changes in the direct and indirect tax rates
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: the taxation sting was at the end of the budget speech when the finance minister proposed the imposition of an agriculture infrastructure and development cess  aidc  on specified goods — including alcoholic beverages  petrol  diesel  gold  silver  cotton  peas and apple
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: the emphasis on process improvement in taxation was based on the assumption that ease of paying taxes would help in tax buoyancy
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: one can see in the budget proposals a determination to pursue growth even if it means a temporary fiscal slide back
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: it’s hope is that more growth will lead to more jobs  reduce poverty and reverse the recent increase in debt gdp ratio
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: the writer is national leader   tax   economic policy group  ey india
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: the views expressed are personal
headline: growth push scores over prudence

line: एनडीआरएफ/प्रतीकात्मक तस्वीर  photo credits  ani   कटक  नौ दिसंबर उड़ीसा उच्च न्यायालय ने आईपीएस अधिकारी सतीश कुमार गजभिए के खिलाफ अनुशासनात्मक कार्रवाई को रद्द कर दिया। मल्कानगिरी पुलिस अधीक्षक के तौर पर अपने कार्यकाल के दौरान कुछ पुलिसकर्मियों को नक्सल विरोधी अभियान के लिए इनाम राशि का कथित भुगतान नहीं किए जाने के मामले में गजभिए के खिलाफ कार्रवाई की गयी थी।  उच्च न्यायालय ने मंगलवार को राज्य सरकार को एक महीने के भीतर 2002 बैच के आईपीएस अधिकारी गजभिए को सभी पदोन्नति देने और स्थगित की गयी अन्य सुविधाएं बहाल करने का निर्देश दिया।  यह भी पढ़े   करोड़ों बैंक ग्राहकों के लिए खुशखबरी  14 दिसंबर से बदल जाएंगे rtgs के ये नियम
headline: country news   orissa high court canceled disciplinary action against ips officer gajbhi

line: न्यायमूर्ति संजू पांडा और न्यायमूर्ति एस के पाणिग्रही की पीठ ने गजभिए के खिलाफ अनुशासनात्मक कार्रवाई को रद्द कर दिया। पीठ ने कहा  ‘‘न्याय के प्राकृतिक सिद्धांतों के अनुरूप वैधानिक तरीके से कार्रवाई नहीं की गयी और इस संबंध में आदेश अमान्य हैं।’’  वर्ष 2015 में गृह विभाग ने अखिल भारतीय सेवा  आचरण  नियम 1968 के कथित उल्लंघन के लिए पुलिस अधिकारी के खिलाफ अनुशासनात्मक कार्रवाई शुरू की थी।  यह भी पढ़े   राजस्थान में एक दिन में कोविड 19 के 1 511 नए मामले आए सामने  2 577 मरीज हुए ठीक  17 की मौत  9 दिसंबर 2020 की बड़ी खबरें और मुख्य समाचार live
headline: country news   orissa high court canceled disciplinary action against ips officer gajbhi

line: मल्कानगिरी के एसपी के तौर पर गजभिए ने 2007 में माओवादी श्रीरामुलू श्रीनिवास को गिरफ्तार करने वाले जिले के पुलिसकर्मियों के बीच इनाम की रकम कथित तौर पर नहीं वितरित की थी।  आंध्रप्रदेश सरकार ने श्रीनिवास पर पांच लाख रुपये इनाम की घोषणा की थी जिसे बाद में बढ़ाकर 12 लाख रुपये कर दिया गया था।  तीन पुलिसकर्मियों द्वारा इनामी राशि का भुगतान नहीं मिलने की शिकायत के बाद नवंबर 2015 में गजभिए के खिलाफ अनुशासनात्मक कार्रवाई शुरू की गयी थी। अनुशासनात्मक कार्रवाई को चुनौती देते हुए उन्होंने राज्य प्रशासनिक न्यायाधिकरण  एसएटी  में इसे चुनौती दी थी। केंद्रीय प्रशासनिक न्यायाधिकरण  सीएटी  में मामला खारिज होने के बाद उन्होंने उच्च न्यायालय में चुनौती दी।   यह सिंडिकेटेड न्यूज़ फीड से अनएडिटेड और ऑटो जेनरेटेड स्टोरी है  ऐसी संभावना है कि लेटेस्टली स्टाफ द्वारा इसमें कोई बदलाव या एडिट नहीं किया गया है
headline: country news   orissa high court canceled disciplinary action against ips officer gajbhi

line: uti mf is launching its small cap fund at a time when ankit believes there are at least 5 drivers for wealth creation in the segment  valuations are still at long term average on p/b basis  even after the run up  and in attractive zone on dividend yield basis  on a rolling 3 yr and 5 yr returns basis  the small cap index is still more comparable to its historic lows  low interest rate environment tends to benefit smaller companies more  at the margin  formalization is gathering pace even in the small caps space – giving small cap leaders significant growth runways  when the broader economy does well – as is expected going forward – small and midcaps tend to outperform
headline: 5 reasons to bet on small caps now

headline: 5 reasons to bet on small caps now

line: on a dividend yield front  the small cap index is closer to a favorable zone
headline: 5 reasons to bet on small caps now

line: moreover  on a rolling 3 year and 5 year returns basis  the small cap index is still more comparable to the historic lows  and nowhere close to the frothy levels we have seen in the past

headline: 5 reasons to bet on small caps now
