line: we are pleased to have found a committed owner for these platforms so that they may continue bringing value to the industry   said meagher
headline: ew nutrition acquires feed quality and pigment business from novus international

line: this event is a significant milestone in our project destiny journey
headline: ew nutrition acquires feed quality and pigment business from novus international

line: the transaction was closed on february 1  2021

line: नई दिल्ली । नई दिल्ली। साउथ कोरियन कंपनी samsung ग्राहकों की बढ़ती डिमांड को देखते हुए भारत में एफ सीरीज  a series  का पहला फोन galaxy a21s लॉन्च करने जा रही है galaxy a21s नाम से आने वाले इस समार्ट फोन को 8 जीबी रैम  128 जीबी के साथ पेश किया जाएगा। galaxy a21s स्मर्टफोन गैलेक्सी एस20 का फैन एडिशन है। जो केवल आपको एक ही वेरियंट स्टोरेज के साथ आपको मिलेगा। भारत में इस नए स्मार्ट फोन की कीमत सामने आते ही लोग बुकिंग तक करने लगे है। galaxy a21s की शुरुआती क़ीमत 14 999 रुपये है। नए वेरिएंट की क़ीमत कंपनी ने 17 499 रुपये रखी है
headline: samsung launching a series of a series galaxy a21s  learn price and offers

line: samsung ने इस फोन को यूजर्स को ध्यान में रखते हुए डिजाइन किया गया है।  galaxy a21s स्पेसिफिकेशन्स और फ़ीचर्स  samsung galaxy a21s में 6
headline: samsung launching a series of a series galaxy a21s  learn price and offers

line: 5 इंच की फ़ुल एचडी डिस्प्ले के साथ पेश किए जाने वाले इस स्मार्ट फोन में 5 000mah पावर की बैटरी दी गई है। इसके साथ ही इसमें 8gb रैम के साथ 128gb की इंटर्नल स्टोरेज दिया गया है। इस स्मार्टफ़ोन में माइक्रो एसडी कार्ड लगा हुआ है जिसके ज़रिए आप इसे बढ़ा सकते है। galaxy a21s में तीन कैमरे दिए गए हैं। जिसमें फ्रंट कैमरा 12 मेगापिक्सल का  दूसरा 12 मेगापिक्सल का और तीसरा 8 मेगापिक्सल का है। सेल्फ़ी के लिए इस स्मार्टफ़ोन में 32 मेगापिक्सल का फ़्रंट कैमरा दिया गया है। कनेक्टिविटी के लिए इसमें यूएसबी टाइप सी पोर्ट है बाजार में यह फोन तीन रंगों में उपलब्ध है जो सिल्वर  ब्लैक और ब्लू कलर वेरिएंट में मिलेंगे।  इसके साथ ही कंपनी अपने यूजर्स को लुभाने के लिए प्री बुकिंग ऑफर्स भी दे रही है। इस फोन को आप यदि लेना चाहते है तो कंपनी ने आईसीआईसीआई बैंक के डेबिट या क्रेडिट कार्ड से खरीदारी करने पर 750 रुपये की छूट दे रही है।
headline: samsung launching a series of a series galaxy a21s  learn price and offers

line: the s20 ultra had a litany of issues    from its disgraceful camera to overcooked processor to its hideous design
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the galaxy s21 ultra  thankfully  redeems all these mistakes in one swift move making it the most complete android smartphone i have tested in a year
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: sure  there will be others that may one up samsung  but right now  it is the king of the hill
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the bigger thing is that it is a phone that is likely to remain attractive no matter what gains the competition comes up with
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the first thing one notices is the slender packaging which is now thanks to the removal of the power brick and the earphones
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this was telegraphed by apple months ago with its strategy to remove these  so called  add ons in the name of the environment
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: samsung like a spastic kid decided to troll apple only to do the very same thing unapologetically like a megalomaniac
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: i don’t like it especially because samsung provided some lovely akg earphones
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: but aside from this  you’re looking at a massive phone which samsung has finessed almost perfectly to un do the evils of the hideous monstrosity that the s20 ultra was
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: dressed in a slick and stealthy phantom black and a delectable camera bump which seamlessly swoops in the frame of the phone and leaving the seemingly chiselled for posterity  the s21 ultra is a looker
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: it also has this supple matte finish which reminds me of the iphone 7 though it comes without the ills of oxidisation as there is gorilla glass victus on the back providing class leading sturdiness and much needed resistance to smudges
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the sides have a polished finish typified by an aluminium frame which makes the phone pretty grippy thanks to the contrast between matte on the back and the polish on the side
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: you flip the phone and there is the massive 6
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: 8 inch dynamic amoled panel which is pretty much the best mobile display on the planet
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: it gets obnoxiously bright at 1500 nits  it has sublime colours  it supports hdr formats which make it a delight to netflix and chill on and it has 120hz refresh rate at a quad hd resolution with it having the ability to dynamically ramp down
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this phone is using a new kind of screen which is also 15 per cent more power efficient
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the display is not the only factor which contributes to the impressive battery life of the s21 ultra   the efficiency of the new exynos 2100 chip  the new software optimizations and the impressively massive size  5 000mah  of the battery are important elements as well
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: exynos redeems its reputation after the shockingly poor 990 chip in 2020
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the exynos 2100 is beastly thanks to the use of the stock arm cortex x1 based architecture coupled with a new 5nm process which ensures this phone isn t just as fast as max verstappen but also delivers consistent 2 day battery life for even when the device is used extremely
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: while you don t get a charging brick  it does support decent charging speeds of 25 watts
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this is admittedly not the best in class but it is at least better than the iphone
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: you also get wireless charging at 15 watts and reverse wireless charging which is incredibly handy
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: but for most this phone is going to be about raw power and that exynos chip delivers in all kinds of situations be it hectic multitasking or gaming or general fluid navigation of the user interface
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this time around i don t foresee a massive discrepancy in the performance of the phone when compared to phones that are powered by the new qualcomm snapdragon 888 chip
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: you also get tons of horsepower in the form of ufs 3
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: 1 memory  256gb of it when paired in tandem with 12gb of ddr5 ram
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this phone is pretty much the fastest android phone i ve tested and i don t see it losing that mantle overnight with some other phones coming as the processor can hold its own against the qualcomm based competition
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the presence of an integrated 5g modem also makes it future proof if you re the type of person who uses a phone for more than 2 years
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: while right now there isn t a 5g network in our country  one can expect that to resolve itself in the next two years where this capability may come in handy
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: but for many all of this culminates to one thing   photography
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: samsung made a hue and cry about the cameras on the 20 ultra but failed to deliver something that was flagship worthy
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this time like in the design and performance department  it also manages to redeem itself in the imaging department with a truly audacious quad camera system which is the most versatile one seen on a smartphone yet  and is easily the class of the field when one singularly looks at the android crowd in terms of image quality
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: it falls behind the new iphones in general reliability  usability and quality but makes up for the variance with the sheer audacity of its functionality and customizable nature
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: samsung uses a new generation of its 108 megapixel camera which outputs 12 megapixel photos unless explicitly asked to shoot at its native resolution using the pro mode
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the end results are impressive as it is consistently able to take rich  saturated and detailed photos that are also brightly lit up even in extreme situations
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the night mode is also fabulous as it lights up even the darkest of scenes but at times it gives off an unnatural vibe
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the focusing issues that plagued the s20 are gone as now there is a laser autofocus system to give it a helping hand
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: versatility is its forte as it can take gorgeous macros and lush landscape shots using the new ultra wide lens or can even double up as a telescope using its twin 3x and 10x optical zoomed in cameras
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: these cameras enable 30x of lossless zoom which looks shockingly good
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: in fact  moonshots at even 100x look impressive but other than that  it s a feature that s more of a party trick than something that will be useful daily
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: add on features like portrait mode also work impressively well
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: a similar trend is repeated on video capture high has been a strong suit of samsung s phones for years
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this time around all four lenses on the back can output 4k video at 60 fps and generally  the quality is tremendous
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: that being said  it is still not the iphone 12 level
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: audio capture is similarly impressive
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: there is also a video booth mode which works quite well and a new birds eye view mode dubbed directors mode helps one use these cameras more effectively
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: similarly  the 40 megapixel front facing camera now becomes the best selfie camera in the business
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: samsung has fixed everything that i hated about the galaxy s20 ultra and yet retained most things that i ve loved about its phones for almost a decade
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this includes class leading haptics which makes this phone a delight to type on
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: superb call quality and reception is a hallmark of this phone while general build quality and the quality of the audio from the stereo speakers is ridiculously good
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: it also now supports high resolution audio over usb type c and can output really great sounding music which would be the envy of audiophiles
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: the fingerprint scanner is also very accurate and responsive which hadn’t been the case for a couple of years  since samsung decided to use qualcomm’s ultrasonic scanners
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: this new generation of the scanner certainly hits the right notes and is bound to be secure  especially when coupled with samsung’s knox enterprise grade security suite
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: but all of this comes with some trade offs
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: samsung has for instance removed mst technology in samsung pay which makes the service almost useless in india considering the poor penetration of nfc enabled pos machines even in a city like new delhi
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: there is no sd card slot so no memory expansion and even like i ve mentioned before  it neither gets a robust facial recognition system nor does it have ultra fast charging technology
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: samsung s software    one ui 3
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: 0 which is based on android 11 is good but not as good as oxygen os or stock android
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: it certainly isn t as elegant as ios 14
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: it also comes with tons of duplicate apps and will likely not get software updates as fast as some other android phones
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: but this is again something typically samsung  as these trade offs come with some benefits as well
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: deep integration with windows and microsoft apps is one which will please a non apple user
headline: review  samsung galaxy s21 ultra represents a redemption moment for the best android phone

line: दिल्ली के सीएम अरविंद केजरीवाल ने कहा   दिल्ली में बर्ड फ्लू के एक भी मामले की पुष्टि नहीं हुई है। हमने अब तक 104 सैंपल लिए हैं और उन्हें जांच के लिए जालंधर लैब में भेजा है  वहां से परसों तक नतीजे आएंगे। नतीजों के आधार पर दिल्ली सरकार को जो भी निर्णय लेने की जरूरत होगी  वो दिल्ली सरकार लेगी।   सीएम केजरीवाल ने कहा   दिल्ली के अलग अलग हिस्सों से पक्षियों के मरने की ख़बरें आ रही हैं  उन पर उसी जिले की रैपिड रिस्पांस टीम उचित कार्रवाई कर रही है। दिल्ली में आज से लाइव बर्ड के आयात पर पूरी तरह बैन लगाया जाता है। गाजीपुर पोल्ट्री मार्केट को आज से 10 दिनों के लिए बंद किया जाता है।

line: loan apps scam  इंस्टेंट लोन ऐप  instant loan app  से लोन लेकर उनके जाल  loan app trap  में फंसे लोगों की आत्महत्या  loan app trap suicide  करने का सिलसिला नहीं थम रहा है। हैदराबाद  hyderabad news  के एक युवक ने आत्महत्या कर ली। एक महीने के अंदर तेलंगाना  telangana news  में लोन ऐप स्कैम  loan app news  में फंसे पांच लोग आत्महत्या कर चुके हैं। पुलिस ने अब तक इस मामले में तीन चाइना के लोगों समेत 29 लोगों को गिरफ्तार किया है।
headline: loan app news  loan apps in telangana  another young man s suicide  5th suicide case in a month

line: the reserve bank of india  rbi  will have to give up its powers to regulate government securities  g secs   the debt instruments issued by the central and state governments  sources in the know told business line
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: the powers to regulate gsecs will be passed on to sebi
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: this is on the back of the budget announcement wherein it has been proposed to merge the securities contracts regulation act  depositories act  and securities exchange board of india act into a new securities code act  sca
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: currently  there is a turf war between the sebi and the rbi over regulation of various instruments classified as securities
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: rbi to cede control  while regulations of equity cash and derivatives fell under sebi’s purview  several other financial instruments classified as securities were regulated by rbi
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: this will now change as the sca takes shape and even sebi’s power and accountability will undergo a major makeover  experts said
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: g secs in the form of gpn  promissory notes   bearer bond  stock and bla  bond and ledger account  are issued by rbi  while the agency banks are presently eligible to issue relief/savings bonds in the form of bla only
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: the definition of some of these securities may change
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: the concept of a unified securities law would help in ease of doing business as there will be a single statutory provision to follow
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: it will also unify the g sec market more closely with the equity  currency and derivative market   said sandeep parekh  founder  finsec law advisors
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: the fine print of the code will be written now after the fm’s announcement
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: in july 2020  sebi chairman ajay tyagi had announced at a public event that issuance of gsecs should follow the stock market model  where companies directly issue shares in the demat account of small investors
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: bringing government securities too under a uniform securities code and combining all investment asset classes under a single regulator  i
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: e
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: sebi  should go a long way in simplifying the regime for investors  both domestic as well as overseas and avoid any regulatory arbitrage to set in   said siddharth shah  partner  khaitan   co
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: even when bids are received on a stock exchange platform  the rbi issues securities only in a constituent subsidiary general ledger account  csgl  of a clearing corporation  which in turn credits the securities to the demat account of the retail investors
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: all big banks and primary dealers have a sgl account with the rbi at mumbai
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: individual traders can open a csgl account with the rbi and get g secs in that account
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: csgl is a form of demat account exclusively monitored by the rbi  like the share trading accounts are all monitored by the sebi
headline: now  sebi may get to regulate g secs
now  sebi may get to regulate g secs

line: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks  mediatek today announced its new m80 5g modem which combines mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g technologies onto a single chip
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the m80 supports ultra fast speeds on both non standalone  nsa  and standalone  sa  architectures  with a peak rate of 7
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: 67 gbps in the downlink and 3
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: 76 gbps in the uplink
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the m80 also supports dual 5g sim  dual 5g nsa and sa networks  and dual voice over new radio  vonr  for more reliable connectivity
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: as 5g rollouts accelerate  mmwave is becoming increasingly important  especially in the u
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: s
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s new 5g modem integrates support for both sub 6 ghz and mmwave networks to address this opportunity and give device makers more flexibility   said jc hsu  corporate vice president and general manager of mediatek’s wireless communications business unit
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: to advance users’ 5g experiences  the new modem supports the latest global cellular standards and specifications and it packs mediatek’s signature power savings technologies along with ultra fast speeds
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s 5g modems are ideal for a range of devices  including smartphones  pcs  mi fi hotspots  broadband customer premise equipment  cpe   industrial iot applications and more
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s first generation 5g modem  the m70  is built into mediatek’s dimensity series of powerful and power efficient chipsets for 5g smartphones
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the company’s 5g portfolio also includes the mediatek t700  which will power 5g pcs set to hit the market in 2021  along with mediatek’s t750 chipset for 5g fixed wireless access routers  fwa  and mobile hotspot devices
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the m80 has been tested against industry standards and is expected to sample with customers later in 2021
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: it offers operators around the world support for a full range of radio access technologies   3gpp release 16 standard sub 6 ghz and mmwave dual connectivity and carrier aggregation 5g nr  fr1  with more than two carrier aggregation 5g mmwave  fr2  up to 8cc 5g carrier aggregation with mixed duplex  tdd   fdd  dynamic spectrum sharing  dss  ready  the m80 integrates mediatek’s 5g ultrasave technologies which improve on the single chip design to provide another layer of extensive power saving enhancements
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek’s ultrasave network environment detection and ultrasave ota content awareness technologies dynamically adjust power configuration and operating frequency based on the network environment
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: the m80 also integrates mediatek’s dynamic bandwidth part  bwp  technology which is designed to optimize bandwidth use to accommodate light or heavy data throughput requests
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: additionally  with the m80’s connected mode drx  c drx  technology the modem will regularly remain powered in connected standby even when there is no data activity
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: mediatek works closely with operators and partners around the world to bring consumers faster and more reliable 5g experiences
headline: mediatek unveils new m80 5g modem with support for mmwave and sub 6 ghz 5g networks

line: on the heels of finance minister nirmala sitharaman’s budget announcement on monday  february 1  2021  here’s a look at the post budget reactions from the tech industry leaders
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: ————————————————————————————————————————————–   the budget announcement confirms government’s focus on developing infrastructure and skills which will have short and long term benefits to indian economy and people
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: from a technology point of view  the incentives for creating digital infrastructure  education and skilling spells out the government’s intent on developing the country’s human capital
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: steps like international collaboration to develop new skills will help indian youth prepare for modern job requirements and make them global ready
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: the announcement of the national digital educational architecture  ndear  is a welcome step  which will help build a digital first mindset in the entire education system in india and help students and educators adopt new ways of learning and teaching
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: in addition  we welcome the doubled allocation for msme sector which will incentivise digital transformation of our small businesses that are the backbone of our economy
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: – ketan patel  managing director – hp india market  ————————————————————————————————————————————–   we are seeing some notable innovation coming out of india’s fintech ecosystem – be it for digital payments  credit and risk management  underwriting or security
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: the initiative to set up a fintech hub in gujarat international finance tech city  gift  will spur investment and innovation designed to help financial institutions not just meet compliance requirements but also build more personalized customer products and services
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: the move to set up a new asset reconstruction company and an asset management company to take care of stressed assets of banks will facilitate more options for banks to manage their npas as the true impact of the pandemic on npas is still unclear  and is expected to be fully known only by q1 fy2022
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: the disinvestment and privatization related announcements related to the banking and insurance sectors will enable much needed capital infusion  and thereby  unlock new growth opportunities in fy 22
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: – sonali kulkarni  lead – financial services  accenture in india  ————————————————————————————————————————————–   the budget has maintained continuity and consistency and in line with the themes of ease of doing business  simplification  transparency and manage effective delivery through digital channels
headline: union budget 2021  how tech industry leaders react

line: the 2021 budget comes as a relief for seniors above 75 years of age
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: the centre has exempted them from filing income tax returns if the paying bank deducts the entire dues from pension and interest incomes
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: once a 75 plus citizen gives a declaration to her bank  it will compute her income after giving effect to the deduction under chapter vi a and rebate under section 87a of the income tax act for the assessment year and deduct the tax payable
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: once this is done  she won’t be required to furnish the income tax return  itr  for the assessment year
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: this amendment will take effect from april 1
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: sitharaman’s proposal is an extension of several announcements made in the budget 2018  when the government proposed to amend laws for giving tax benefits to senior citizens
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: while dishing out her goodies on the direct taxes front  the finance minister offered a sigh of relief to taxpayers by not raising the rates
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: she also halved the time limit for income tax proceedings for re opening of assessment to three years from the end of the relevant assessment year
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: the most important relief for all businesses would be the reduction in time limit for reopening of assessment to three years for normal cases  and only in case of concealment of income of over rs 50 lakh  it has been retained at 10 years
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: this would also go a long way in boosting the investor confidence and ensuring tax certainty   says divakar vijayasarathy  founder and managing partner at dvs advisors llp
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: for non resident indians  the government has proposed to remove the element of double taxation to simplify issues arising out of their accrued incomes in their foreign retirement accounts as a result of mismatch in taxation periods
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: the budget 2021 also proposes that the advance tax liability on dividend income would arise after declaration or payment of dividend
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: while the expectations were rife for a cut in the personal income tax rate and also an increase in the deduction limit under section 80c and 80d to boost consumption  the government decided to provide some relief to nris  senior citizens and also dividend investors this time   says ajit mishra  vp research at religare broking
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: to make filling up of income tax returns easier and simpler  the details of capital gains from listed securities  dividend income and interest from banks would come pre filled  while the details of salary income and tax payments would need to be filled up
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: other proposals in the direct taxes arena include setting up of the national faceless income tax appellate tribunal centre and introduction of electronic communication between the tribunal and the appellate
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: for in depth  objective and more importantly balanced journalism  click here to subscribe to outlook magazine
headline: union budget 2021  no filing of returns for seniors above 75 years

line: bloomberg  bloomberg  a mammoth spending plan of almost  500 billion announced by prime minister narendra modi ’s government is expected to jump start growth in an economy battered by the coronavirus pandemic  but may not be enough to make a dent in the rising unemployment and poverty india has battled
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: finance minister nirmala sitharaman on monday unveiled a national budget that will cause the fiscal deficit to balloon to a much higher than expected 9
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: 5  in the current year ending march on the added expenditures
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: stock market investors cheered the plan  hoping for an economic resurgence and celebrating the absence of new taxes on the wealthy and corporations  while bonds tumbled on worries about the record deficit
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: still  the budget didn’t have major proposals to address the job losses  hunger  and rising pressures on the farming and rural sectors
headline: india’s  500 billion budget to spur growth leaves little for the poor

line: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award  prweb2021 02 02  gallium nitride  gan  continues to ramp into  20b silicon chip market  navitas semiconductor today announced they have been awarded aspencore’s electronic products’  power product of the year  2020
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: navitas’ gan power ic nv612x series was selected as the winner based on the chips advanced efficiency  power density and performance leading innovations in the field of gallium nitride  gan  which is transforming power electronics from mobile fast chargers  to data centers  solar inverters and ev/emobility applications
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: the product of the year awards  now in its 45th year  recognizes outstanding products that represent a significant advancement in a technology or its application  an exceptionally innovative design  a substantial achievement in price/performance  improvements in design performance  and a potential for new product designs/opportunities
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: aspencore’s electronic products’ editorial staff selected gan power ics as the clear winner for advancing power electronics due to unparalleled capabilities in power density  size and performance
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: the ganfast nv612x series is a next generation power semiconductor technology built on gallium nitride  gan  technology that runs up to 20x faster than silicon  si  and enables 3x more power or 3x faster charging in half the size and weight
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: the nv612x series delivers a cool 10°c to 15°c reduction in temperature with an enlarged thermal interface to the pcb and a direct thermal and electrical connection to the system ground  enabling the world’s highest power density and passing all thermal specifications and agency approvals resulting in dramatic improvements in energy savings and power density
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: while competing solutions require additional  complex  external driving and protection components  the unique and proprietary monolithic integration of gan power and drive plus protection and control means the new ganfast parts still deliver the simplest  smallest  fastest and now even cooler performance
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: navitas is honored to receive this prestigious  product of the year  award from aspencore’s electronic products
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: as proof of market adoption  the nv612x series is in the high volume production of smartphone and laptop fast chargers for major brands including lenovo  oppo and dell   said gene sheridan  co founder and ceo of navitas
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: with 13 million shipped and zero failures  ganfast is a high performance  high reliability power platform   exactly what we all need as we work together to electrify our world and reduce co2 emissions
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: navitas has successfully penetrated mobile fast chargers and is now expanding into other markets including data centers  5g base stations  solar inverters  energy storage and emobility applications
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: navitas predicts that gan can save 2
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: 7gt of co2 emissions by 2050  equivalent to a year’s output from 700 coal power plants
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: is the world’s first and only gan power ic company  founded in 2014
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: navitas has a strong and growing team of power semiconductor industry experts with a combined 300 years of experience in materials  devices  applications  systems and marketing  plus a proven record of innovation with over 300 patents among its founders
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: gan power ics integrate gan power with drive  control and protection to enable faster charging  higher power density and greater energy savings for mobile  consumer  enterprise  emobility and new energy markets

line: over 120 navitas patents are issued or pending  and over 13 million ganfast power ics have been shipped with zero failures
headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

headline: navitas semiconductor wins prestige  power product of the year  award

line: we believe that technology and innovation are the forces to reshape our world

line: new delhi  feb 1    union minister jitendra singh on monday said the budget 2021 22 has come as a relief for a nation struggling with the constraints of covid 19 pandemic
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: he said the priorities laid down by the budget will also set the tone for other countries of the world to follow
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: contrary to the misgivings and propaganda by the opposition  the budget presented today has silenced all the critics and left them to criticize only for the sake of criticism   said singh  the minister of state for personnel
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: advertisement  he said the budget in in tune with the post covid india vision
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: singh said even though it is an economic document  the spirit of the budget presented today goes beyond the realms of economics to lay down the roadmap of modi led india which is destined to emerge as a frontline member in the community of world nations
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: he said instead of putting extra burden or liability on the common man  as was being speculated by several commentators  budget 2021 22 has actually come as a relief for a nation struggling with the constraints of covid pandemic
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: advertisement  for example  high priority to the health sector is not only unprecedented but will also give india the self confidence of being on its own and walking ahead of others by venturing into most novel initiatives like corona vaccine for a nation led by a government that realises the value of physical well being  preventive health care and wellness  the minister said
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: referring to some of the lesser known aspects of the budget  singh said  it has brought cheer for every section of society
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: on one hand  while the tax holiday for start ups has been extended by one year for the youngsters  on the other hand for the elder citizens  the income tax has been exempted for pensioners above the age of 75 years  he said
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: singh said the mention of a gas pipeline for jammu and kashmir and a university for leh indicates prime minister narendra modi s concern for the two youngest union territories of india
headline: budget has come as relief for nation struggling with covid pandemic constraints  jitendra singh

line: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff  copyright 2021 pr newswire
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: 1  2021 /prnewswire prweb/    the tennessee credit union league has partnered with lemonadelxp  the learning experience and digital adoption platform for credit unions  to help its member organizations upskill staff and improve their member experiences
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: built specifically for financial institutions  lemonadelxp uses a combination of game based microlearning  technology walkthroughs  and role play scenarios to create engaging learning experiences  and drives better learning outcomes for both on site and remote staff
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: using lemonadelxp s rapid authoring  credit unions can improve their learning experiences while saving time and money on content creation
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: lemonadelxp also offers a suite of ready made training content designed specifically for financial institutions including dei  digital  sales  member experience  and more
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: the pandemic has made it difficult for our member credit unions to train their employees   said tcul s chief revenue officer  david griffiths
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: lemonadelxp will help them replace in person training with engaging and effective remote learning
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: in addition to its effective remote training experience  lemonadelxp s premium feature  digital academy  supports both staff and members as they migrate to digital banking
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: the digital academy is timely because credit unions need ways to deliver an exceptional experience for members who are switching digital channels to bank safely during the pandemic
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: we re pretty excited about this partnership
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: we built lemonadelxp specifically to help financial institutions tackle their remote training and digital adoption challenges and this partnership will help us support more credit unions faster   said john findlay  ceo of lemonadelxp
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: we know lemonadelxp is the perfect solution for this moment in time
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: it s highly effective for training on site and remote staff  and the digital adoption platform helps support staff and members as they migrate to digital
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: about the tennessee credit union league  the tennessee credit union league was formed in 1934 as a 501  c   6  non profit trade association for tennessee credit unions
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: it is the mission of the league to promote and support the success and advancement of credit unions in meeting their service and structural goals
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: the league accomplishes its mission by     positively influencing the legislative and regulatory atmosphere for credit unions  providing operating support through training  education  compliance information and assistance  providing industry specific research and communication support
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: all tennessee credit unions are eligible to join the tennessee credit union league through the payment of annual dues
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: branches of foreign credit unions headquartered in another state may also gain access to the services provided by the tennessee credit union league if the credit union is a member in good standing of the state league in which they are headquartered
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: about lemonadelxp  lemonadelxp is an award winning learning experience and digital adoption platform for financial institutions
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: the learning experience transforms corporate training into addictive game based microlearning
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: unlike gamification platforms that slap game tactics onto existing training content  lemonadelxp morphs the entire learning experience into games  so employees learn through play
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: using a unique combination of serious games  product simulations  role play scenarios  and powerful analytics  lemonadelxp offers a refreshing approach to corporate training that upskills remote and on site employees faster

line: the digital adoption platform  digital academy  supports branch  contact center  office staff  and customers as they migrate to digital channels
headline: tennessee credit union league partners with lemonadelxp to help credit unions upskill remote and on site staff

line: digital academy allows financial institutions to quickly author a branded  searchable  wcag aa compliant online hub with technology walkthroughs  app simulations  loan application guides  and videos — no developers needed

line: french manufacturer  citroen has finally unveiled their india specific c5 aircross suv
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: while prices are yet to be announced  the brand s entry into india will be marked by the suv which is being offered in a single diesel engine but in two trim levels  feel and shine
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: citroen is manufacturing the c5 aircross locally at the company s facility in tamil nadu with the eventual goal of reaching 90 percent localisation
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: in terms of design  we get to see citroen s unique language
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: while the final silhouette is that of a conventional suv  there are geometric patterns littered throughout the car
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: the front sports a split headlamp unit  both connected with horizontal lines
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: while the lower lines form the grille  the upper lines converge in the middle into the brand s logo
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: off to the side  you have the airbumps and at the rear  you get tail lamp squares filled with more squares and the trapezoidal exhausts below that
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: powering the suv is a 2 litre diesel engine that churns out 177 ps of power and 400 nm of torque
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: this will be mated to an 8 speed automatic gearbox
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: citroen has also added in their progressive hydraulic cushion equipped suspension
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: this  the company claims will be able to filer out bumps and dips in the road allowing for a better cabin experience
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: on the inside  the geometric theme continues
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: features include a 12
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: 3 inch digital instrument cluster  8 inch touchscreen infotainment system  android auto and apple carplay  keyless entry  dual zone climate control  electrically adjustable driver s seat  recline adjustable and slidable rear seats
headline: news n            citroen c5 aircross finally unveiled in india  launch expected soon

line: the car also gets cruise control  powered and heated ovrms  puddle lamps  auto headlamps and rain sensing wipers

line: new delhi  feb 1  ians  with railways getting the highest ever total plan capex at rs 2
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: 15 lakh crore  railway board chairman and ceo suneet sharma on monday described the union budget 2021 22 as a  transformational  budget for the national transporter and one which has focus on deliverance
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: addressing a press conference here  he said   this budget is a different budget altogether
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: it is a transformational budget  it is a future ready budget for railway  it is a path breaking budget
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma said the focus of this budget is on deliverance  commitment to delivery  time schedule  focus on customers  focus on technology  induction to provide better services to customers  better passenger and freight services
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: highlighting the works of the railways during the covid pandemic  he said   during the year  we have been able to make significant change in our working
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: during this difficult time of covid pandemic  we could transport essential commodities from one part of the country to other
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: we also took initiative in moving our migrants
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he stressed that the covid was a difficult time  but railways used it as an opportunity
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: there was a large number of works which we did during covid pandemic  by removing bottlenecks  repairs and rehabilitation of assets   he said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma also said that the works resulted in the average speed of the trains showing a dramatic growth in doubling the speed of the freight trains from 23 kmph to 46 kmph
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: on the details of the budget announced by union finance minister nirmala sitharaman in lok sabha  he said   indian railways has now highest ever total plan capex of rs 2 15 058 crore this year with rs 7 500 crore from internal resources  rs 1 00 258 crore from extra budgetary resources and rs 1 07 100 crore for capital expenditure allocation given in the general budget
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that the railways received a record outlay of rs 1 10 055 crore  of which rs 1 07 100 crore is for capital expenditure
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: the gross budgetary allocation is rs 37 050 crore higher than be 2020 21  which is 53 per cent
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: inspite of the covid  this is remarkable vindication of the progress being made being undertaken in infrastructure projects in railways   sharma said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: with this increase in capex  indian railways will be the driver of indian economy
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: the thrust of annual plan 2021 22 is on infrastructure development  throughput enhancement  development of terminal facilities  augmentation of speed of trains  signaling systems  improvement of passengers or users’ amenities  safety works of road over or under bridges etc   he said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: discussing the national rail plan  he said the nrp envisages the plan for railways for 2050 for which the infrastructure needs to be prepared by 2030
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: sharma also said that national projects of jammu and kashmir  himachal pradesh  uttarakhand and north eastern region have been allocated highest ever outlay of rs 12 985 crore
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that in budget estimate of 2021 22 against the revised estimate of 2020 21 of rs 7 535 crore  there is an increase of 72 per cent
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that rs 37 270 crore of gross budgetary support has been allocated for investment in psu/jv/spvs  with allocation for dfccil at rs 16 086 crore  for national high speed rail corporation ltd  nhsrcl  at rs 14 000 crore and kolkata metro rail corporation ltd  kmrcl  at rs 900 crore
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: highlighting the projects which the railways completed last year  he said   during the covid pandemic  we completed some important projects like connecting the railway line to kevadia in gujarat for the statue of unity  inauguration of over 650 km of dedicated freight corridor  dfc
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that railways are hopeful of completing another 500 km of dfc by this financial year and complete the entire project by june 2022
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he also said that wheel production will also be indigenised in rae bareli  as well as vande bharat train sets  track machines  and also the train collision avoidance system  tcas
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: we have started using tcas for 250 km of south central railway and for 1 200 km of sanctioned work is going on
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: and we plan to cover the high density network and high utility network in coming years   sharma said
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: discussing the future plan of railways  the ceo said   at least 150 more private trains through ppp mode  more tejas trains  more vista dome coach trains for tourists  3rd ac economy class coaches  smart coaches which are providing more features like announcements  temperature control system and to check water levels  head on generation cars to make space for more coaches
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: he said that satellite based tracking of trains with isro already operational on 6 500 trains
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: –ians  aks/vd
headline: with highest ever plan capex  railways budget transformational  ceo

line: new delhi  finance minister nirmala sitharaman on monday announced the much awaited voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to phase out old and polluting vehicles  and vehicles older than 15 years will be required to undergo fitness tests
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: presenting the budget for 2021 22 in parliament  sitharaman said that under voluntary vehicle scrapping policy   personal vehicles would undergo fitness test after 20 years while commercial vehicles would require it after completion of 15 years
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: vehicles would undergo fitness tests in automated fitness centres after 20 years in case of personal vehicles  and after 15 years in case of commercial vehicles
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: details of the scheme will be separately shared by the ministry   the finance minister said
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: this will help in encouraging fuel efficient  environment friendly vehicles  thereby reducing vehicular pollution and oil import bill  she said
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: stating that the policy would cover over one crore light  medium and heavy motor vehicles  road transport  highways and msmes minister nitin gadkari said details of the voluntary scrappage policy will be declared within 15 days
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: gadkari said the policy will lead to new investments of around rs 10 000 crore and create as many as 50 000 jobs
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: the policy would cover an estimated 51 lakh light motor vehicles  lmvs  that are above 20 years of age  while another 34 lakh lmvs are above 15 years
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: it would also cover 17 lakh medium and heavy motor vehicles  which are above 15 years  and currently without valid fitness certificates   gadkari said
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: these vehicles are estimated to cause 10 12 times more pollution than the latest vehicles  he said
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: last month  the government had said it plans to impose green tax on old polluting vehicles soon in a bid protect environment and curb pollution while vehicles like strong hybrids  electric vehicles and those running on alternate fuels like cng  ethanol and lpg will be exempted
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: the revenue collected through the green tax will be utilised for tackling pollution
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: under the scheme  transport vehicles older than eight years could be charged green tax at the time of renewal of fitness certificate at the rate of 10 to 25 per cent of road tax  as per green tax proposal sent to states for consultations after cleared by the ministry
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: outlining the benefits of the scrapping policy  gadkari said it would lead to recycling of waste metal  improved safety  reduction in air pollution  lower oil imports due to greater fuel efficiency of current vehicles  and stimulate investment
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: he said india will be a automobile manufacturing hub in next five years
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: he said demand for new vehicles will grow and automobile industry will reach rs 6 lakh crore from the present rs 4
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: 5 lakh crore
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: reacting on the announcement  kenichi ayukawa  president  society of indian automobile manufacturers  siam   said   good macroeconomic growth will translate to good auto sector demand
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: specifically  the vehicle scrappage scheme has a good intent and the auto industry would be keen to work with the government on suggestions for maximising benefits to environment and society
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: rudra pandey  partner  shardul amarchand mangaldas   co termed the policy as a positive step towards supporting the automobile industry  which has been hit hard in the past year due to the impact of covid 19
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: the automobile industry had made a vehicle scrapping policy one of their principal demands to enable them to combat this situation
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: the policy is proposed to be introduced on a voluntary basis  and the intention is to phase out old and unfit vehicles  both commercial and personal  from indian roads  which will not only result in a reduction in environmental pollution but will also boost the sales of new vehicles  including the production and sale of electric and hybrid vehicles   he said
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: pandey said it is likely that the policy will provide for certain financial/ loan based incentives to be provided to customers who choose to scrap their old and polluting vehicles for newer alternatives
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: the policy will provide a fillip to the indian government s efforts to position india as a global automobile manufacturing hub  as well as benefit global automakers with manufacturing industries in india  including japanese giants suzuki  toyota  nissan  amongst others   he said
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: on july 26  2019  the government proposed amendments to motor vehicle norms to allow scrapping of vehicles older than 15 years in a bid to spur adoption of electrical vehicles
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: we have submitted the proposal and i am expecting that we will get approval as early as possible for the scrapping policy   gadkari had said on january 15
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: the minister had also said that once the policy is approved  india will become an automobile hub and there will also be reduction in the prices of automobiles
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: he had said recycled material from old vehicles will help reduce the prices  adding that the automobile industry s turnover  which is rs 4
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: 5 lakh crore with rs 1
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: 45 lakh crore exports  will get a boost
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: in may 2016  the government had floated a draft voluntary vehicle fleet modernisation programme  v vmp  that proposed to take 28 million decade old vehicles off the road
headline: voluntary vehicle scrapping policy to cover 1 crore vehicles  govt

line: कांग्रेस के पूर्व अध्यक्ष राहुल गांधी ने सेना में ‘टूर ऑफ ड्यूटी’ प्रस्ताव की आलोचना करते हुए पीएम मोदी पर तंज कसा है। उन्होंने ट्वीट कर कहा   याद कीजिए रडार के बारे में जिन्होंने भारतीय वायुसेना को समझाया था  ‘टूर ऑफ ड्यूटी’ भी उसी दिमाग की उपज है। भारतीय सेना एक लड़ाकू बल है  पर्यटन स्थल नहीं है।   गौरतलब है कि भारतीय सेना ने मई में भर्ती के लिए ‘टूर ऑफ ड्यूटी’ मॉडल का प्रस्ताव रखा था  जो युवाओं को तीन वर्ष के लिए स्वेच्छा से अस्थायी तौर पर सेना में शामिल होने का मौका देगा। इसका उद्देश्य सेना में भर्ती के लिए ज्यादा से ज्यादा युवाओं को आकर्षित करना  अधिकारियों की रिक्तियां भरना और अंतत  रक्षा पेंशन का बोझ घटाना है  जो ‘वन रैंक  वन पेंशन’  ओआरओपी  योजना लागू होने के बाद बढ़कर रक्षा बजट का लगभग 30 प्रतिशत हो गया है। फिलहाल इस प्रस्ताव पर चर्चा हो रही है। वहीं  कुछ जानकारों का कहना है कि यह प्रस्ताव भारतीय सेना के लिए ठीक नहीं रहेगा। राहुल गांधी ने इसी प्रस्ताव के बारे में अपने ट्वीट में बोला।

line: xiaomi’s latest addition in the mi 10 series was mi 10i 5g  which was launched last month in india
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: as per a recent tweet from xiaomi  the mi 10i 5g has crossed sales worth rs 400 crore in just three weeks of coming into the market
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: it is worthy to note that it is one of the most power packed 5g devices available in the mid range segment  and that certainly reflects on the kind of sales the device has generated
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: xiaomi announced the smartphone on january 5  2021  and the company availed the device early at january 7 for amazon prime users and then for open sale on january 8  2021
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: crossing the sales number that it has is quite an achievement given the kind of competition there is in the mid range 5g devices
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: let’s take a look at the xiaomi 10i 5g specifications and understand what is so good about this smartphone
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: mi 10i 5g specifications  xiaomi mi 10i 5g comes with a 6
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: 67 inch fhd  screen
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: the device can support 120hz refresh rate and has a smart adaptability feature which keeps changing the refresh rate of the screen to match the needs of the content
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: the mi 10i 5g comes powered by the qualcomm snapdragon 750g soc and has up to 8gb of ram and 128gb of onboard storage
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: the device will run on android 11 on top of miui 12 out of the box
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: in the camera department  there is a quad camera setup at the rear with a 108mp hm2 sensor coupled with an 8mp ultra wide angle sensor  depth sensor  and a macro shooter
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: there is a 16mp sensor at the front for video calling and clicking selfies
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: the highlight of the camera is that it allows users to record in up to 4k and other high quality formats
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: there is a fingerprint sensor at the side of the device for additional security
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: it comes with a 4 820mah battery which gets the support of 33w fast charging technology
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: it will be able to charge the device from 0  to 68  in under 30 minutes
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: xiaomi mi 10i 5g price  xiaomi mi 10i 5g comes for a price of rs 20 999 for its base variant with 6gb 64gb
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: then there are two superior variants with 6gb 128gb priced at rs 21 999 and 8gb 128gb priced at rs 23 999
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: the device is available at the official website of xiaomi and amazon india
headline: mi 10i 5g sales cross rs 400 crore in three weeks

line: it is the pricing and the specifications of xiaomi mi 10i 5g which make it a killer smartphone  and thus it has seen amazing sales
